column1: full on leg stump, and he misses the flick off his bat. Hits the pad, and rolls away to fine leg. Inswinger first up from Starc
full outside off, and Rahul tentatively sticks his bat out. Takes the bat's outside edge, but flies low between gully and slip for the game's first boundary
full on leg stump, and he looks to play with the straight bat. Plays this inside the delivery's line, and the shot is squirted away to point
full just outside off stump, and another tentative defensive shot from Rahul. Takes the inside-edge and flies away to fine leg
beauty! Length ball on middle, and just angling away after hitting the deck. Mayank tries to defend away from his body, but the ball whizzes past his outside edge
through him! Full on off, and Mayank tries to drive away from his body. The ball comes in after hitting the deck, and goes between bat and body to Paine. Not an attractive shot at all
full outside off stump, and Rahul defends with soft hands. Ball hits the bat's outside edge, and rolls through the gap between slip and gully for his second boundary in that manner
back of a length outside off, and Rahul rides the bounce to fend off the back foot

taken at first slip! Rahul's horror run continues. Length ball outside off, and the delivery stays in line. Rahul plays for the delivery that will angle in, and the defensive shot takes the outside edge. Easiest of catches at first slip as India lose their first
back of a length on middle, and Pujara nudges this off the back foot to the leg side. Tricky shot with short leg lurking
length ball just outside off, and Pujara covers his off stump before shouldering his arms. Nice bounce into Paine's gloves
full outside off stump, and Pujara defends with the bat's open face. Pushed to point. Applause around the ground as Hazlewood completes a successful over for Australia
full and wide outside off, and Mayank toe-ends a drive to mid off. He came forward to play too early there
full outside off stump, and the ball angles further away. Left alone by Mayank this time
full on off, and <b>driven<b/> beautifully past the non-striker. Mid on gives it as a chase as the batsmen run back for the second. Gets off the mark as well
low full toss on middle. Trying to go for the yorker there, and Mayank defends with soft hands
length ball outside off stump, and going away from Mayank. He covers his off stump, and then shoulders his arms
nasty! Back of a length on middle, and the ball takes some extra bounce. Mayank sways away from the ball very late, and the delivery whizzes just past his outside edge
back of a length outside off, Pujara lets it go by shouldering his arms
full on off stump, and Pujara prods forward to check-drive. Mid off intercepts
full just outside off stump, and defended with the bat's open face to cover
full on off, and that's angling into his pads. Pujara shuffles across the stumps, and then nudges it past midwicket for a couple
full just outside off stump, and the ball takes some extra bounce after the seam hits the deck. Pujara shoulders his arms as the ball flies over off stump
full on middle, and he nudges it away to midwicket for another double. Easy for Pujara with the ball coming into his pads

full on middle, and Agarwal plays an inside-out straight drive past Pujara. Offers the bat's full face, and opens the bat's face slightly to play it through the off side. Starc looking for the swing, with the ball pitched that full
length ball on leg stump, and that's been clipped away to Hazlewood at fine leg
full on middle stump, and he turns this with the bat's closed face to midwicket. Straight to the fielder
full on off, and seaming away. He prods forward to drive, and pushes this gently to Heat at cover for a single
length ball on middle, and aimed at Mayank's body. He rides the bounce and confidently defends off the back foot
full outside leg stump, and seaming further away. Taken by Paine shuffling down the leg side
length ball on off, and angling inwards. Defended off the back foot, and the ball rolls back to Hazlewood
length ball just outside off stump, and defended away to cover off the back foot
full outside off, and some late inswing from Hazlewood! Pujara covers his off stump to shoulder his arms, but he then stretches his leg late to try and pad the ball away. Goes through to Paine
full outside off stump, and this one is left alone by Pujara
back of a length on middle, and Pujara quickly spots the length. Ducks under the ball's line on this occasion
length ball outside off that holds it's line after hitting the pitch. Pujara shuffles across his stumps, and defends to point
full and wide outside off, and Mayank goes chasing after it. Looks to drive through the covers, but he's beaten by the outswing. Through to Paine
full outside off, and shaping slightly away. Mayank takes a big stride forward, and drives through cover point. Chase for the infielders as they come back for two
full on off, and he prods forward to block. Pushed to cover with soft hands
full just outside off stump, and he takes a big stride forward to defend. Ball rolls away to cover
full on off, and Mayank shuffles across towards off stump, before driving past Pujara and mid on. Slow outfield today, another double for India
full outside off, and that's the shot of the day! Confident movement forward and driven through the covers
length ball outside off, and seaming away after hitting the deck. Left alone by Pujara
full just outside off stump, and he prods forward to defend. Pushed to cover point on this occasion
full just outside off, and driven straight back to Hazlewood. He fails to collect the ball on his followthrough, which means Pujara can pinch the single
full just outside off, and defended off the front foot to mid off
length ball on off, and seaming away after hitting the pitch. Mayank squares up to defend, and adjusts late to bunt it towards point
full and wide outside off, and left alone by Mayank
length ball outside off stump, and it goes through to the keeper as he shoulders his arms
full on middle, and defended with the bat's closed face to midwicket
length ball outside off stump, and left alone by Pujara. The delivery was seaming away on this occasion
length ball on off stump, and Pujara covers his off stump, before bunting a defensive shot towards the leg side
full just outside off, and he takes a tiny step forward to meet the ball. Pushed to mid on

full outside off, and Pujara steps forward to drive. Played with the bat's open face, and the shot takes the outside edge. Races away through the point region for a boundary to ruin a good Cummins over
length ball outside off, and angling further away. Left alone
bounce! That will keep the Indian batsmen on their toes. Just a length ball on off, but it takes off after hitting the deck. Paine takes this from above his head
length ball on middle, and seaming away from Mayank. He keeps his bat in front of off stump, and taps it away to cover with gentle hands
full just outside off, and defended off the front foot to cover. The ball dribbles away to the off side
overpitched outside off stump, and Mayank brings his bat down to wedge a shot away. Shafts a defensive shot to point
back of a length on leg stump, and cramping the batsman for space. Uncomfortably nudged away - off his armpit region - to square leg for a single
back of a length on off stump, and he rides the bounce to defend off the back foot. Played towards the leg side

full just outside off stump, and he check-drives through the covers. Meets the ball in front of his body, and this has come off the middle of the bat. The fielder at cover simply chaperones the ball to the boundary on this occasion
back of a length on middle, and he nudges it away off the back foot to square leg. Vacant there
full just outside off stump, and Pujara moves towards the off side, before defending with the straight bat
length ball just outside off stump, and he defends with soft hands off the back foot. The ball falls in front of his toes, that's how gently he played the shot
bouncer to end the over. Not directed well, landing well outside the stump line. Pujara sees it go through to Paine
back of a length on middle, and Mayank rocks back to defend. Bunted back towards the non-striker

full outside off, and he drives away from his body. A dangerous ploy with the ball angling away, but Mayank manages to find the bat's middle. Not much wrong with the delivery as the ball finds the cover boundary
back of a length on off stump, and defended off the back foot
back of a length outside leg stump, and Mayank looks to get away from the ball's line. Delivery too far from his body to bother him though, and Paine scampers towards the leg side to intercept

back of a length on middle, and this time Starc has gone quick (145.5kph). Extra bounce off the deck as the batsman shoulders his arms. Ball goes away from him and eventually settles in the keeper's gloves
hits his elbow! Back of a length on leg stump, and Mayank looks to fend this away to the leg side. He's beaten for pace, and the delivery hits his arm before rolling away to fine leg
length ball on off stump, and he covers his stumps before defending off the back foot
back of a length on off stump, and he ducks under the ball's line. Through to Paine
length ball just outside off, and defended with the bat's open face. Plays this towards point for a single
back of a length on off, and check-punched to Lyon at cover. They scamper across for one
length ball on off, and seaming inwards on this occasion. Pujara stands tall, and defends this away towards the leg side
full just outside off, and he front-foot defense takes an inside-edge towards the leg side
back of a length on off, and angling further away. Mayank chooses to play at it, and toe-ends a back-foot defensive shot to mid off
back of a length on off, and Agarwal tries to cut this away. The extra bounce forces a mis-hit from Mayank, as the shot comes off the bat's bottom. Rolls away to point
back of a length on leg stump, and he rides the bounce before nudging this towards the leg side. Carefully played, especially with short leg still lurking
back of a length on middle stump, and he tiptoes to defend. Played towards the off-side on this occasion
back of a length outside leg stump, and this goes down the leg side to Paine
short! And that hurried onto Mayank. He had no clue where the ball was, and while trying to duck the ball took a bit of his glove, and flew over the slips for a very lucky boundary
full just outside off stump, and he prods forward to defend. Ball rolls away to cover

appeal for caught behind! But the umpire says 'no'. Paine thinks he's got him, and therefore asks for a review. It was a length ball outside off that snaked in sharply off the deck. Pujara's defensive shot was outside the ball's line, and the ball went through to Paine between his bat and body. Snicko shows there's contact only off the trouser, so Pujara will survive. Australia lose a review
length ball just outside off, and this delivery just holds it's line. Pujara looks to defend in front of off stump, but the ball goes oh-so-closely past his outside edge
length ball just outside off, and he defends off the back foot to the non-striker
full just outside off stump, and Pujara quickly prods forward to defend
length ball outside off, and another delivery with a bit of late movement. Seaming inwards after pitching, but going over the top of off stump after Pujara lets it go
back of a length on middle stump, and he rides the bounce to defend it away in front of square. Carefully played with short leg lurking
short on leg stump, and Mayank is cramped once again. Manages to squirt this off the back foot - rather unattractively - to fine leg
length ball on middle stump, and Pujara allows the ball to come to him, before tapping it away to the off side
length ball on middle, and nudged away to the leg side for a single
back of a length on middle stump, and defended away to mid off
short ball angling across Mayank. He meets the ball near his eye-line, and taps it away to point. Dropping his wrists on the delivery there
full outside off stump, and he meets the ball on the front foot to defend
full ball outside off stump, and Pujara takes a big stride across the stumps to cover his stumps. Shoulders his arms thereafter
length ball angling in, and defended off the back foot to midwicket. Delivery angling into Pujara on this occasion
back of a length outside off, and Pujara ducks to take cover. A well-directed short ball that goes into Paine's gloves
full outside off, and he goes for a cover drive. Played with the bat's open face, and it almost goes right into cover-point's hands! Drops just short of Lyon there
length ball on middle, and nudged away with the angle to square leg
back of a length on middle, testing Mayank again. He tiptoes and blocks with gentle hands, as the ball rolls away to gully
short on middle, and this time Mayank sways away from the delivery's line. Chooses not to duck, instead trusting his eyes to judge the line
length ball originating outside leg stump, but meeting Mayank on middle. Defended off the back foot, played right back to Starc
length ball on leg stump, and angling into Mayank. Defended once again off the back foot
back of a length, but wide down the leg side. Mayank considers flicking it fine, but eventually pulls his bat back
back of a length outside leg stump, and Mayank meets the ball near his armpit, before playing down a nudge towards backward square with the short-leg fielder lurking
back of a length on middle, and extra bounce takes the ball over Mayank's helmet. Paine does well to hold on to it

full just outside off, and Mayank comes forward to drive. He plays for the ball coming in, but the delivery holds it's line. Takes the outside edge, and dribbles through the gap between gully and slip. How many runs have gone down that region today?
short on off, and Mayank looks to sway away from the ball. Drops his gloves early, but the ball hits his shoulder
back of a length on off stump, and Mayank ducks under the ball this time. Another testing bouncer, which equally tests Paine's catching skills
fuller outside off stump, and Mayank pushes at this away from his body. Finds the gap between cover and point, and that's the fifty partnership for the duo!
length ball wide outside off stump. Left alone by Pujara
back of a length outside off, and Mayank taps this in front of square on the off side. Terribly close to the silly-point fielder
short from Starc, and Mayank ducks under this delivery. Paine does well to jump and collect the ball well above his head
length ball outside leg stump, and played down off his body to the leg side. Stopped by short leg
length ball on middle, and angling across. Tapped off the back foot towards cover for a quick single on this occasion
full on middle stump, and Pujara takes a tiny step forward to defend. Played back to Starc
back of a length outside leg stump, and Paine does very well to hold on to this! Dives to his left, and sticks one hand out to ensure that doesn't go for four byes
length ball just outside off, and he rocks back to defend towards cover
back of a length on off, but not quite Starc's pace. Mayank comfortably defends off the back foot
back of a length on off, and Mayank drops his knees, gets under the ball's line, and observes the delivery go into Paine's gloves
full just outside off stump, and defended away to cover point off the front foot
length ball outside off stump, and seaming away slightly. Left alone by Mayank
back of a length outside off stump, and he rides the bounce to tap this away to cover
full just outside off, and he skips down the wicket to drive. Straight to mid on
full outside off, and Pujara skips down again. But he pads it towards the off side this time
length ball outside off and spinning in. He stays on the back foot, and flicks off his pads to deep midwicket
tossed up, full on off stump. Mayank takes a big stride forward and drives down the ground to long-on for a walking single
length ball outside off stump, and Mayank taps this off the back foot to the off side. Soft hands with short cover near his face
full just outside off, and Pujara comes down the ground to dive. Played past Lyon's right to mid off
back of a length outside off, and he covers his off stump before shouldering his arms
good length on off, and he comes forward to defend. Played towards the off side
back of a length on middle, and Mayank shuffles across to the off side before nudging this towards the leg side. In the air for a bit, but falls short of short fine leg
full just outside off stump, and Pujara prods forward to bunt this towards cover

hits his helmet! Hazlewood asks if he's okay, and Pujara says he's fine. Short ball on middle stump, and Pujara takes his eyes off the ball without ducking. Hits the back of his head, just above the neck region. The physio comes rushing in with umpire Kettleborough checking up on the helmet's damage
short again to end the over. Back of a length on off stump, and he sways away from the delivery's line
full just outside off stump, and played straight with the turn. Lyon misses on his followthrough, and mid-on finally intercepts
full on off stump, and he dances down the wicket, before flicking to cow corner. Man in the deep for that shot
length ball outside off, and this time it takes some extra bounce. He shapes up to cut, and plays it square past the lurking short-cover fielder
good length outside off stump, and tapped off the back foot to cover

appeal for stumped? And the umpire wants to go upstairs. It was a length ball that skidded through, and Mayank's back-foot defense goes through to Paine on the bounce. Quick work to whip the bails off, but Mayank's feet were firmly behind the crease
length ball just outside off stump, and blocked off the back foot to see the session out. India at 1 for 69
short of length outside off, gets on the top of the bounce and punches it towards cover-point
length, on middle and leg, tucks it towards backward square leg and gets to the other end
back of length around off, gets behind the line of the ball and drops it down
short of length, rising towards the rib cage, jumps in the air and plays it down towards leg gully
and again, short on the body, Agarwal fails to keep it down this time but luckily it flies to the right of the leg gully
a touch fuller, just around off, stump, Pujara defends it right under his eyes
back of length and angling towards the off stump, punches it off the back foot towards covers
length around off, drops it towards cover, was looking for a single but it went quickly to the fielder
much straighter this time, length on the stumps, gets behind the line and dead-bats it
back of length, rising and angling across Agarwal, who gets over the top of the bounce and punches it to the left of the mid-off
length, some room outside off, Pujara steers it between point and gully, opening the face of the bat at the last moment, Agarwal comes back for the third
back of length, just around off, gets on his toes and defends on the off side
fuller around off and Pujara brings his wrists into play, flicks it through midwicket, good running once again allows three
back of length, at the batsman, Agarwal rises with the bounce and drops at down
a bouncer, but it flies over the batsman's head, Paine too had no chance as it races towards the long leg boundary
back of length, aiming for the rib area, Agarwal gets on his toes and defends it down
length, pitching around off and coming in with the angle, Agarwal is deep in his crease, defends it on the off side
another attempted short one but doesn't get his line right this time, down the leg side. No problems for Agarwal there who was looking to duck under
another short one but once again down the leg side, easily negotiated
length around middle and leg, defended on the on side
fuller this time, in the channel, Pujara is not interested
short of length this time, just around middle and off, defended from the back foot towards cover
back of length around off, Pujara looks to defend from the back foot, gets an inside edge on to the pads, playing with extremely soft hands
short of length again but much straighter this time, flicked off the hips towards backward square for a couple of runs more
a nasty bouncer, quick, aimed at the batsman, the ball hits the arms and lobs behind the stumps as Pujara looks to take an evasive action
length around off, pushes at through covers for a couple of runs
short of length down the leg side, swivels to pull it towards fine leg, Starc comes across to save three runs for his team, was travelling fast
back of length around off, gets on his toes and blocks
back of length around off, not much bounce on this occasion, pushed towards mid-off
back of length once again, much better bounce this time, Pujara goes back and drops it at his feet
a touch fuller this time, around off, defended towards mid-on
another good bouncer from Starc, pitching around leg and leaving the batsman. Agarwal does well to sway away from the line of the ball

length around off, stands tall and punches it through covers, Siddle chases it and pulls it just inside, Agarwal comes back for the third and that's his fifty. The umpires are checking if Siddle did alright there, no, he didn't. The leg was brushing the skirting as he pulled the ball back
length ball, punched towards long-on, calls Pujara back for the second
short of length outside off, some room there to free his arms, looks to punch it hard but loses his shape, dribbles towards covers
short of length, around off, rising towards the batsman who gets on the toes and defends it towards gully

short and some room once again, punched off the back foot through covers, Siddle once again with the chase, and looks like it's another four, his left foot was just in contact with the skirting as he pulled the ball back. Should be four, but the umpire doesn't think so
another short one on the body, not sure how convincing was this, didn't bounce that much, Agarwal moved inside the line, took his eyes off the ball, and pulled, beating Starc at fine leg on his left
short of length around off, defended from the back foot
fuller this time, Agarwal was on the back foot but manages to drive it past mid-on, not the best of the timings though, comes back for the second
a bouncer this time, but way too short and angling down as well, Agarwal ducks under quite comfortably
short again, much better this time, aimed at the batsman who jumps in the air, and drops it down, soft bottom hand
short again and another pull shot towards fine leg, Starc moves to his left to cut it off
and straightaway Agarwal jumps out of his crease, was a length ball, Agarwal was not to the pitch of the ball but went through his shot and it sails over Starc at long-on
short of length, almost chipped back towards Lyon, just short of the bowler, gets a run to mid-off
short of length outside off, punched towards extra covers, calls for two and two he gets
short of length outside off, big turn there for Lyon, Pujara chops it into the ground as the turn cramps him
length around off, and spinning back, defended with a straight bat
length around off, Pujara uses his feet this time, and thrusts his bat and pad at it
fuller on the stumps and flicked towards the right of mid-on, a sliding stop to the right keeps it to one
length around off, comes forward and dead-bats it
short and wide and Pujara latches on to it, cuts it hard past the point fielder
kicking up from a length to surprise Pujara who was looking to defend it, hits him on the left glove
length, in the corridor, nice carry to Tim Paine as Pujara leaves it alone
length around off, just moving away to hit the outer half of the bat, rolls towards backward point
length around off and spinning away, whips it to the right of mid-on
length outside off, Pujara skips down and pushes bat and pad at it, a huge appeal from Lyon for lbw as the ball raps on the knee roll, not out
use of feet to work it towards midwicket for one this time
down the track and lofted right over the bowler's head, once again not to the pitch of the ball but clears the straight boundary easily, that's his highest score in young Test career
length around off, punched towards covers off the back foot

Lyon has bought a wicket for his team here, just shortened his length a tad as Agarwal skipped down once more, was again not the pitch of the ball but like on two previous occasions, decides to go with the shot, doesn't get the distance this time and an easy catch for Starc at long-on
length, wide outside off, comes forward before shouldering arms
a touch fuller and straighter, a hint of shape back in to the batsman, Kohli comes forward and blocks
length again, in the corridor, left alone
sublime, exquisite, crisp. A touch fuller outside off, comes forward and just presents the full face of the bat to send this to the extra cover boundary, gets off the mark
length around off, comes forward and defends it down the wicket
an attempted short one outside off, doesn't bounce much but Kohli sways away and drops his hands to let it go through
length outside off, uses his feet and then wrists to work it towards midwicket
fuller around off, turns it on the leg side
length around off, defends it from the crease
length again, turns it towards short midwicket with the spin
length around off, comes forward and defends it towards short leg
short of length on middle and leg, goes back and works it towards fine leg, comes back for the second
fuller on the stumps from Hazlewood, punched towards mid-on
a bouncer this time, just around off, Pujara lets it go through to the keeper
mixing it up here Hazlewood, fuller again, just around off, punched back towards the bowler
short of length around off, gets on his toes and drops it on the off side
back of length around off, defends it on the off side
another short one, aimed at the batsman who ducks under easily
full outside off, and he takes a big stride forward to drive. Long-on protects the deep
full on off stump, and nudged after walking down the wicket to midwicket
length ball outside off, and takes a bit of extra bounce. He backs away to cut, but finds the fielder at point
tossed up on middle, and he skips down the wicket to flick towards the leg side. Good use of the wrists, but finds midwicket
full on off, and once again he's run down the wicket to drive through the on-side. Mistimed to mid on
full and wide outside off, and this time Pujara can get his bat's full follow-through through the ball. Struck hard, past Lyon's left, and mid-off can't cut it off either
full outside off, and seaming inwards. Kohli meets the ball in front of his eyes to defend
full outside off stump, and Kohli covers his off stump by shuffling across, and then shoulders his arms to this delivery
length ball just outside off, and Kohli looks to steer this behind square. Opens the bat's face to play the late cut, but the shot has gone to first slip on the bounce
back of a length on off, and he bends his knees to get under the ball's line
full outside off stump, and he takes a big stride forward to block
length ball outside off stump, and zipping straight through. Left alone by Kohli
full on middle stump, and he uses his feet to get to the pitch of the ball. Whipped off hies toes, but stopped by Cummins at midwicket

full and wide outside off, but spinning inwards. Pujara gets his pads towards the ball to kick it away, but the ball doesn't turn as much, eventually going past his pads and landing into the keeper's gloves
full outside off, and he stays in his crease. Worked off his pads to the leg side
full and wide outside off, and Pujara skips down the wicket before tapping it away to cover
flatter from Lyon. Lands outside off, and turns into his pads. Flicked off his pads to fine leg off the back foot
full just outside off stump, and worked with the spin to short midwicket
length ball just outside off, and angling inwards. Blocked off the back foot to the on-side
full outside off stump, and he takes a small step forward to block. Dribbles away to cover
back of a length on off, and Pujara ducks under the ball. The delivery doesn't bounce as much, and goes to Paine on the bounce
length ball on middle, and he stays outside the line of the ball, before defending with the straight bat. Takes the outside edge and rolls away to point
length ball outside off, and that's been check-punched off the back foot. Played from in front of off stump, and intercepted by cover point
full on off stump, and he blocks this in-seamer off the front foot. Rolls away to mid on
full on off stump, and worked away to the leg side off the front foot
full on off stump, and he takes a big stride forward before nudging towards midwicket
length ball on off stump, and he stays on the back foot, before clipping a shot off his pads to deep backward square
length ball just outside off stump, and turning in. Pujara keeps soft hands, and works it away past short leg
full outside off stump, and he skips down the wicket to drive. Muscled to mid on
full outside off stump, and pushed along the ground to mid on
back of a length outside off, and he rides the bounce to defend off the back foot
length ball just outside off, and he leans forward to defend. Offers the bat's straight face
length ball outside off, and seams inwards after going past Kohli. But by then he had already shouldered his arms and started ti prepare for the following delivery
length ball outside off stump, and Kohli takes a big stride forward before shouldering his arms
back of a length, wide outside off stump. In the slot for Virat to cut, but he chooses to let it go instead
length ball wide outside off again. Kohli doesn't even bring his bat down. A tidy first over of the spell for Cummins
length ball outside off, and he rocks back to play a grounded pull shot to midwicket
full just outside off stump, and he skips down the wicket before defending
length ball outside off, and skidding through. Pujara shapes up to punch, but he misses the shot. Ball sneaks past his outside edge
full outside off, and spinning inwards. Driven to mid on
length ball outside off, and spinning in. Stays on the back foot and punches this back to the bowler
full outside off stump, and he runs down the wicket to play with the straight bat. Driven to mid-on
length ball on the fourth-stump line outside off stump. Kohli's more than happy to let it go through to Paine
length ball outside off, and Kohli swivels to pull. A rare mistimed shot, dribbling away to deep square leg
full just outside off, and he takes a big stride forward to defend. Ball rolls back to Cummins
length ball just outside off, and seaming inwards. Kohli presses forward, and defends towards cover
full outside off stump, and Kohli comes forward to defend with the bat's open face. Played behind square, but stopped by the man at point
length ball just outside off stump, and defended back past the bowler
length ball outside off stump, and he carves this off the back foot past cover. Chase for the infielder, Handscomb
full on off stump, slower from Lyon. Kohli keeps his eyes on the ball, and nudges it to the leg side
extra spin! Length ball wide outside off, and this comes in sharply. Kohli tries to flick off his pads, but he top-edges it behind square to fine leg
length ball outside off, and he lets the ball spin into him, before punching with the straight bat to mid-on
full outside off, and Pujara skips down the wicket before padding the ball away. Lyon appeals for lbw, but impact was outside off with the bat hidden behind the pad
shouts of 'catch it', but the ball lobs over short leg. Full outside off, and once again padded away by Pujara. Lyon thought he got some glove to it, but that wasn't the case
length ball on off, and Kohli swivels to pull. Once again a false shot from Kohli, as he gloves this very fine to the fine-leg boundary
length ball outside off stump, and Kohli taps this away off the back foot to point
length ball outside off, and Kohli shuffles across to the off side, before defending off the back foot
full outside off stump, and he presses forward to defend. Played with the angled bat to cover point
length ball on the fifth-stump line, and Kohli allows the ball to go through
back of a length but too wide outside off. Kohli offers no shot as Paine collects from near his face
tossed up outside off, and spinning inwards. Worked to S Marsh at midwicket
length ball outside off, and he stays on the back foot to cut. Timed well, but a diving effort from short third-man saves some runs
full outside off stump, and Pujara presses forward to defend with gentle hands
full outside off stump, and he walks down the ground before defending to cover
length ball outside off, and he uses the depth of the crease before pulling along the ground to the deep midwicket boundary! Rode the bounce well, before finding the gap
full outside off stump, and pushed away to cover after going to the off side
length ball outside off stump, and Kohli - once again - chooses not to play at a ball that's not aimed at his stumps
back of a length outside off stump. Slightly slower from Cummins, with a bit of spongy bounce. Kohli shoulders his arms once more
full just outside off stump, and he presses forward to defend firmly. Rolls away to cover

length ball outside off, and Kohli presses forward before opting to shoulder his arms. But his bat doesn't go up quickly enough, and it hits the inside-half of his bat before bounce through the slip cordon for four. Another false shot from Kohli
length ball outside off stump, and left alone
full outside off stump, and Kohli covers his off stump by stepping across his stumps, before offering no shot to the delivery
full outside off stump, and the offspin delivery is smothered by Pujara's pads
length ball just outside off, and flicked late off his pads to fine leg. Big gap there, so enough time for Pujara to jog back for the second run

length ball outside off, and he makes some room before playing a late cut past first slip. Chase for the fielder at point, and he manages to pull it back with the ball slowing down. Kohli thought it was a boundary so he wasn't even running, so India lose an extra run there
length ball on off, and nudged off his pads to square leg
length ball outside off, and he rocks back to punch off the back foot to short midwicket
full outside off, and he puts a big stride across the stumps before clipping a shot to midwicket
full on middle stump and skidding through. Tapped off the back foot to the leg side
half-tracker on middle stump, and Pujara stands tall before pulling along the ground to deep midwicket. Easily swatted away and that's another Pujara half-century!
full just outside off stump, and he takes a big stride forward to defend
half-tracker on middle again, and Pujara doesn't waste an opportunity to punish the bad ball. Pulled in front of square this time, and the ball races away to the cow-corner boundary
full outside off stump, and defended with the bat's open face to point
another short ball on middle stump, and once again put away by Pujara. Uses the depth of the crease before pulling in front of square for four more. Super expensive first over from Labuschagne
length ball outside off, and turning into Kohli. Nudged off the back foot to short leg
tossed up wide outside off, and Kohli reaches at it before dragging a clipped shot to midwicket
full on off stump, and worked off his pads to midwicket
classic Kohli! Tossed up wide outside off, and he beautifully presses forward before letting his bat speed do the rest. Driven exquisitely through the covers for a boundary
length ball wide outside off, and he drags a back-foot punch to midwicket
full outside off, and he takes a big stride forward to defend. Kohli plays the shot, turns around, and walks towards the pavillion. That's tea
length around off, Pujara plays with an angled bat, steering it past gully for a couple
length on middle and leg, turned away towards fine leg with the wrists
length around off, comes forward and defends
short of length on middle and leg, pushes it towards short midwicket

guess what! They have got Kohli caught down the leg side, that's twice in two innings. Was short of length, down the leg side, Kohli looked to work it fine, the ball hits the gloves and Paine takes a tumbling catch. The game has opened up once again
starts with a short one around off, Rahane sways away from it
length around off, comes down the ground and defends
short of length, Pujara rocks back and pulls it behind square this time, beats the man at the fence and gets another boundary
length again, outside off, skips down and thrusts his bat and pad forward
length around off, comes forward and pushes it on the leg side
length, but way outside off. Pujara covers his off stumps and lets it go
length on middle and spinning away, works it fine for a couple
length around off, comes forward and defends it towards cover
length around off, stays back, gets behind the line and blocks
a bouncer from Hazlewood, just around the off stump, Rahane sways away from the line, bounces just in front of Paine
length around off, coming back in to the batsman as Rahane shoulders arms, good carry to the keeper this time
short again, but way too outside off this time, Rahane stays away from the line
length on middle and leg, tucked away towards deep square leg, off the mark
length around off, Rahane goes back quickly and cuts it through point for a couple
length around off, comes forward and blocks
length again, just around off, defended
length around off and spinning back, Rahane was looking to work it on the leg side, plays a bit early, the ball hits the bat and ricochets on to the pads
length around off, defended on the front foot
short of length this time, Rahane goes back and defends with a straight bat
length, just outside off, keeps very low, near shin height, goes underneath Pujara's bat, on the bounce to Pain
length around off, Pujara gets behind and blocks it watchfully
back of length, on middle and leg, goes back and works it towards fine leg
short of length outside off, Rahane stands tall and punches it thorough backward point region, was in the air but in the gap as well
length on middle and leg, works it towards short midwicket
fuller around off, half a step forward and smothers it
length, around off and middle, Rahane goes back and punches it towards short midwicket
length again at 85kph, just outside off, comes forward and blocks
a touch fuller this time, defended on the front foot with bat and pad close
a touch wider on this occasion, blocked on the front foot
length around off, comes forward and smothers
length on middle and spinning down, glances it towards short fine leg
short and lifting towards the batsman, just outside off, Pujara does well not to get anything on it
short of length around off, gets behind this and drops it on the leg side
short of length on middle and leg, tucked away towards square leg
bouncer, on middle and leg, ducks under quite comfortably
length around middle and leg, defends it towards short midwicket
length around off, stays beside the line of the ball and defends it towards cover-point
length around off, comes forward and blocks
back of length around off, goes deep in his crease and defends with a vertical bat
length around off, defended from the crease
length around off once again, goes back and keeps it out
length around off, leans forward this time and defends towards cover
an inside edge as he goes back to defend this length ball, spins sharply but all safe in the end, dribbles towards short fine leg
length around off, coming in with the angle, Pujara stays back and defends it towards short midwicket
back of length around off and Pujara once again defends it on the leg side
length around off, comes forward and blocks on the off side
and finally the score moves! Length on middle and leg, tucked away towards square leg for a couple of runs
fuller around off, drives it down the ground but mid-on moves across to his left to cut it off
short of length, on middle and leg, defended on the leg side
length around off, stays in his crease and blocks
a touch fuller this time, skips down the track and pushes it back to Lyon
short of length, goes back this time and flicks it towards deep square leg
short of length around off, defended on the off side
length outside off, skips down the track and pads it away
fuller around off, pushes forward, the ball hits the outer half and rolls towards covers
fuller this time, just outside off, Rahane pushes it to the left of the mid-off fielder, not much power behind it
length around off, comes forward and blocks
short of length, on middle and leg, Rahane looks to pull but mistimes it into the ground towards square leg
short but way down the leg side, balloons to the keeper
short of length on middle and leg, Pujara moves just inside the line and works it fine
back of length around middle, tucked towards square leg
a touch fuller on the stumps, Pujara skips down and flicks it through short midwicket, the ball teases Starc all the way to the boundary before winning the race
back of length this time, around middle and leg, punched from the back foot towards the bowler
once again using the feet to hit it to the right of Starc at mid-on, second boundary in three balls for Pujara, moves to 82
length ball on middle and leg, turns it on the leg side, short leg intercepts
length on middle and leg, uses his feet to push it towards short midwicket
length this time, on a similar line, defended on the leg side from the crease
fuller on the pads, flicks it towards square leg for an easy single
back of length around off, pushes it towards gully at the last moment
back of length, coming slower off the wicket, Pujara was looking to work it on the leg side, closes the face of the bat a touch too early as the ball hits him on the gloves
a bouncer this time on middle and leg, Pujara had no trouble in ducking under
length around off, tucks it towards midwicket, who is very square, almost in a catching position
length, once again in the line of the stumps, Pujara defends it with a straight bat towards mid-on
length around off, skips down the track but the ball drops at him, ends up dragging it towards short midwicket
length around off, goes back and turns it on the leg side
down the track again to a length delivery, this one holds its line, pushed on the off side in the end
length around off, goes deep and blocks
tossed up around off, comes forward and blocks
length, flatter and wide at 94 kph, Rahane covers his stumps and lets it go
back of length around off, defended from the crease
back of length outside off, opens the face of the bat to run it to the right of the gully fielder
short of length around off, goes back and behind the ball, drops it at his feet
length around off, stays beside the line of the ball and defends
length around off, stays in the crease and defends it on the off side
short of length but down the leg side, Pujara lets it go
length around off, skips down the track and blocks
length around off, goes back in his crease this time and defends it on the off side
length around off, punches it towards the bowler from the back foot
length around off, leans forward and blocks
short of length outside off, chops it towards covers off the back foot
length around off, stays back and blocks
fuller on the stumps and Pujara flicks it beautifully past the mid-on fielder, right from the middle of the bat
cuts it off the back foot this time, short of length, some width outside off, and crunched towards the point boundary, moves to 92
length around off, comes forward and defends
lucky there, was a length ball outside off, Pujara was looking to punch it on the off side, gets an inside edge that goes past the stumps
fuller around off, opens the face of the bat to run it towards third man
back of length outside off, pushes it on the off side
fuller on middle and leg, skips down and flicks it in front of square leg
length on middle and leg, defended from the back foot
length again, spinning on middle and leg, defended on the leg side
short of length outside off, some extra bounce as Rahane goes for the cut, slightly uppish but in the gap between cover and extra cover
fuller on the pads from around the wicket, uses his feet to push it towards midwicket for one
length ball, spinning on the pads, turned towards short fine leg
fuller on the stumps and driven back, Starc intercept, almost deflecting the ball on the stumps, Pujara was back in time as the ball rolls on to the stumps

a snorter of a delivery! A bouncer, angling in towards the batsman from around the stumps, puts Rahane in a tangle, he looks to sway away, takes the bottom off but the ball bounces a touch extra, brushes the top glove and Paine takes a good overhead catch
short of length in the rib cage, defended behind square
another short one, angling across the batsman who drops his wrists, flies to Tim Paine
short, a bit of room outside off, transfers his weight on the back foot and punches it through covers, gets off the mark with a boundary
another short one but this time down the leg side, lets it go through
length outside off, comes forward and defends with bat and pad close, a loud appeal for lbw but outside the line of the off stump
a similar sort of delivery, uses his feet to work it towards short midwicket
flatter and straighter around off, defended on the back foot
flatter again, just outside off, defended on the off side
skips down the track to this length ball before padding it to short leg who had a shy at the stumps but Pujara was back
works it behind square this time and keeps the strike
back of a length outside off, and soaring over Pujara's head
back of a length outside off, and that's been steered off the back foot to point for a single
full on off, and angling into Vihari's pads. Pushed to mid-on
back of a length outside off stump, but not much bounce this time. Goes through to Paine with Vihari offering no shot
length ball aimed at his body, and that's been nudged away to the square-leg region for a single
full on leg, and clipped away to the fine-leg boundary! Races away and that's hundred for Pujara! Third of the series, 18th in all Tests
length ball outside off, and he covers his off stump, before punching straight back to Lyon
caressed! Full and wide outside off, and he leans into an exquisite cover drive that threads both cover and mid off. Head gives it a chase, and pulls the ball back from just inside the boundary
length ball outside off, and spinning inwards. Flicked off his pads to deep midwicket
full outside off, and he presses forward to defend back to Lyon
length ball just outside off, and fended off the back foot
full just outside off stump, and he presses forward to defend right back to the bowler
length ball outside off, and the ball turns further away. Stays on the back foot, and cuts to deep point for only a single
full outside off, and he drives with the legbreak to deep extra cover
full just outside off stump, and turns a bit away. Pushed to cover off the front foot
full just outside off stump, and he presses forward to defend it back to the bowler
length ball just outside off, and skidding through to Pujara. Blocked off the front foot
full outside off, and Cheteshwar's excellent cover drive is stopped by the diving infielder. Had four written all over it
full just outside off, and he clobbers this down the ground for four! Skips down the pitch, and then swings through the ball's line. 250 for India
full just outside off, and worked off his pads to the leg side
length ball on off, and turning into his pads. Worked off his legs to the fielder at short leg
length ball on off, and nudged with the turn to Cummins at square leg
legth ball just outside off, and defended off the back foot to the bowler
full outside off, and he skips down the wicket to pad the ball away
length ball outside off, and cut off the back foot to deep point
juicy full toss on off stump, and that's been hammered into the wide long-on boundary! Pujara's eyes lit up right away, and he gave it the treatment it deserved
full just outside off stump, and tapped away to the vacant cover-point region
full on off, and turning away from the batsman. Pushed to cover
tossed up outside off, and Vihari shovels a cover drive to the sweeper fielder on the off side
length ball outside off, and turning further away. Punched with the bat's open face to the sweeper-fielder riding the cover boundary
length ball just outside off, and turning into his pads. Worked off his hips to square leg
full outside off, and he skips down the wicket, before whipping this away to deep midwicket
length ball just outside off, and nudged off his hips to square leg for a quick run
full outside off stump, and flicked - with his bottom hand - to the leg side. But stopped by the diving midwicket fielder
full outside off, and worked off his toes to the gap near deep midwicket. Enough time to jog back for the second
full just outside off, and turning further away. Pushed with the angled bat to cover point
overpitched on middle stump, and driven down the ground to mid-on for a quick run
length ball just outside off, and tapped off the back foot to cover
full outside off stump, and driven with the bat's open face to cover point
full and wide outside off stump. Spinning further away, and Pujara offers no shot
length ball skidding straight through, and Pujara shuffles across before flicking this behind square off his pads
full outside off, and he skips down the wicket to pad this away
length ball outside off, and he rocks back to nurdle a leg-side whip off his pads
length ball just outside off stump, and flicked off his hips to the sweeper-fielder on the leg side
length ball outside leg stump, and he pushes at this behind square. Cummins runs it from short fine-leg to intercept
full outside off stump, and flicked to Handscomb at short leg. Well stopped
full just outside off stump, and Pujara skips down the wicket to defend. Bat-pads it towards the leg side, and Lyon's lbw appeal is turned down
full and wide outside off, and he shapes up to drive away from his body. Mistimed to cover
length ball just outside off, and the attempted back-foot punch takes an inside edge towards the keeper's left. They scamper across for a single
full and wide outside off stump, and Pujara lets it go
drops the length by a bit. Lands outside off, and seams further away, with Pujara shouldering his arms
full on leg stump, and that flicked off his toes behind square! Beautiful sound off the bat, and that's been played to the left of fine leg
length ball wide outside off, and going further away. Left alone
length ball landing on off, and taking a boomerang-bounce into Paine's gloves. Vihari covers his off stump before letting it go
full just outside off, and he shoulders his arms because he chooses not to engage with the delivery
length ball just outside off stump, and tapped away to point off the front foot
gorgeous! It's full just on off stump, and Vihari leans into a nonchalanat cover drive. Head does well to pull the ball back, but the umpires want to check if he did disrupt the rope
length ball on leg stump, and defend
length ball on leg stump, and he nudges this to square leg for single
back of a length on middle, and he sways away from the ball's line. Comfortably taken by Paine
length ball just outside off, and he carves a back-foot punch through the gully region. No stopping that!
full just outside off stump, and he presses forward to defend. Ball rolls away to mid off
full on middle, and he offers the bat's full face to drive down the ground. Well struck, but Hazlewood stops the delivery on his followthrough
length ball just on middle stump, and nudged away to the leg side
full just outside off, and Vihari tries to drive straight again. This time man at mid off intercepts
length ball on leg stump, and clipped away to the big gap behind square on the leg side. Chase for Labuschagne from square leg
length ball on middle stump, and he defends off the back foot. Ball rolls back to Starc
full on middle, and Pujara shuffles across to the off side, to defend off the front foot
length ball on middle, and angling across Pujara. Tapped off the back foot to point
hits his shoulder! Second time today. Back of a length on middle stump, and Pujara ducks to a ball that didn't bounce much. He looks okay, though, despite the physio running some concussion checks

snorter! Back of a length on leg stump, and rising every moment thereafter. Pujara sways away very late from the deliver'ys line as it ends up in Paine's gloves. Sure Pujara could smell the leather off the ball there, it was that close to his face

length ball outside off, and he bends his knee to crunch a square drive through the off side! Waits for the ball to get to him, before perfectly executing a back-foot drive. Four written all over that
back of a length on off stump, and that's flown right into Paine's gloves
full just outside off, and he pushes this to cover with soft hands
length ball just outside off, and Vihari drops his gloves early. Ball doesn't bounce much, and Paine collects it behind the stumps
back of a length on off, and he rides the bounce to block off the back foot. Impact off the bat maker's sticker
length ball outside off, but angling in. Too close for the cut, but he plays it anyway. Protection in the deep
length ball outside off, and that's been slapped through point! Waits for the delivery to get to him before depositing the wide-ball away for four
back of a length on leg stump, and tapped to midwicket
length ball just outside off, and fended off the back foot
back of a length outside off, and he steers a late glance behind square on the off side. Stopped by Usman Khawaja at backward point
length ball outside off, and extra bounce from Starc this time. Pujara squares up to cut, but the ball sneaks just past his outside edge
length ball on leg stump, and nudged away to square leg
full and wide outside off stump, and Vihari throws his hands at this. Check-drives uppishly over cover and starts Cummins' spell with a four
length ball just outside off, and tapped to cover. Empty area there, so they comfortably jog for a single
length ball on middle, and nudged off his hips to deep backward square leg
back of a length on middle, and Vihari drops his knees to allow the ball to go over his head
length ball just outside off, and he defends uncomfortably from near his face
full and wide outside off stump. Check-drives this time, and the shot takes the bat's toe end. Rolls back to Cummins
length on middle and leg, whipped in front of square for one
length on middle and leg, turns it towards short leg
fuller on the stumps, pushed towards short midwicket
short of length, on the pads, flicked towards short fine leg
and that's 300 for India. Short of length, Vihari moves inside the line this time and pulls it towards short fine leg, a bit of fumble there allows the run
length on middle and leg, flicked towards the left of short fine leg
a bouncer on middle and leg, doesn't rise as much but enough for Vihari to duck under, on the bounce to the keeper
short again, in the rib cage, manages to keep it down, towards leg gully
bouncer again, aimed at the batsman but goes well over Vihari, and for good measure he ducks under as well
short again, around middle and leg. Vihari moves inside the line this time and lets it pass
another short one, much better line this time, rising towards the batsman as he looks to drop it down, a bit of glove and on to the armpit
another snorter, this time just outside off, Vihari does well to get his hands out of the line
length around off, skips down and works it towards midwicket, all along the ground
length around off, turned away towards midwicket for one more
length on middle and leg, turned on the leg side
length on middle this time, Pujara uses his feet and flicks it towards deep midwicket
length wide outside off and spinning, Vihari pads it away, an appeal for lbw but not out
fuller on the stumps, pushed towards short midwicket
length around off, defended from the crease
fuller outside off this time, Pujara leans into the drive and beats the extra cover fielder who chases it all the way and pulls it just inside, comes back for the third
bouncer this time, just outside off, sharp, nippy and Vihari does well to arch back and sway away from the line
back of length this time, on the stumps, defended down the wicket
short of length, just around off, punches it towards covers
another bouncer, this time banged in too short, outside off and it balloons to the keeper as Vihari stays away from the line
starts with a length ball, just outside off, defended towards covers
length again, just around that fourth stump line, Pujara once again transfers his weight back and defends it on the off side
short of length once again, a bit straighter this time, defended in front of the wicket on the leg side
straying on the pads this time and Pujara obliges with a flick behind square, fine leg comes across to cut it off
back of length once again, around middle and off, punched towards mid-on
short of length, just outside off, didn't bounce that much, Pujara defends it on the back foot
nips back in sharply from a length outside off, Vihari was looking to cut it away but it's too full and too close, the ball cuts him in half

and this one just moves away after pitching, Vihari was late on the push, his initial movement is back and across and by the time he could bring his bat down, the ball had whizzed past the outside edge
length around off, in the channel, Vihari is happy to shoulder arms this time, good carry to Paine once again
length again, a touch wider this time, left alone once more
a good short one from Hazlewood, much closer to the batsman, at a decent pace and that short either, but Vihari was equal to it, drops his wrists and sways away
length this time, and tad wider as well, Vihari seems to have restrained himself after those couple of plays and misses, lets it go through to the keeper
length, just around off, Pujara comes forward and defends it under his eyes

length, in the corridor, as opposed to the last over where he was bowling a short of good length and Pujara was able to go on the back foot to defend, the first two deliveries have forced him to come forward, left alone though
and now pushes him back with a bouncer, quick and aimed at the batsman, Pujara ducks under comfortably
a touch fuller outside off, fourth stump line, a solid copybook front-foot defence by Pujara
back of length this time, a similar line, just outside off, a back-foot block this time to drop it at his feet
short of length, on middle and leg, Pujara is on the top of it, plays it down towards backward square leg
back of length around off, Vihari goes back and blocks with a vertical bat
a touch fuller this time, Vihari stays beside the line and pushes it through covers for a couple
length, straying on the pads this time, tucked away towards fine leg
pitched up and driven though covers, two fielders chase it and its Lyon who wins, puts in the dive to pull it just inside, three more to Pujara
short, just outside off, Vihari sways away from the line
short but way down the leg side, Vihari looks to pull it away but cannot reach there, Paine dives to left to gather it
a bouncer on off and middle, Pujara was quick to go under that
length ball outside off, pushes it towards backward point
fuller on the stumps this time, driven gently towards mid-on
another good bouncer, just outside off, Pujara arches back to let it go
back of length around off, Pujara is happy to stay on the back foot and plays it with soft hands towards covers
a touch fuller but still not full enough to bring Pujara forward, stays beside the line and defends it with an open face
length around off stump, Vihari gets behind this one and defends with a straight bat
a touch fuller this time, Vihari's initial movement was once again to go back but does well to defend it towards the bowler
length, just outside off. Vihari is happy to leave that as it flies to Paine, who collects it near chest height
an attempted bouncer but down the leg side, Vihari isn't bothered by it
a touch fuller, just outside off, Vihari comes forward and defends it with hard hands
a similar line and length once again, defended on the front foot by Vihari
veers a full delivery into the stumps, Pujara defends back with hard hands
looked to drive through extra cover, may have got this off a thickish inside edge, rolls to mid-off. Pujara was on the move with the stroke
hint of width, he transfers his weight back and forces this into the gap between cover and point
sways out of the way of this short ball angled in. Vihari dropped his wrists and watches this zip past
waste of a short ball, flies way over his head as Vihari ducks under this
gets half a stride in and defends into the off side.
floats this full, invites the drive, but this is an excellent leave, full of intent. Nibbled back in just a hint
gets right on top of the bounce, loosens the bottom-hand grip and fends this into the leg side
extra bounce off the deck for Hazlewood as this short of length delivery angles in, Pujara tucks this to short square leg. Once again, the bottom hand came off his bat handle as the ball thudded in
goes full and attacks the stumps, Pujara flicks him with the angle to beat midwicket, who gives it chase. Aggressive running to come back for the third. Superb wrist work to fetch it from off stump
stands tall and punches this length delivery to Lyon at backward point
driven into the gap at cover, played that from the crease, moved with the shot.
uses the depth of the crease to go back and across and punch back
lunges forward and turns this tossed up delivery with the spin to short leg. Got on top of the bounce nicely
touch short, but there's sharp turn from outside off, Vihari goes back and across in defending it into the off side
lunges forward to get to the pitch and defend into the covers
right back into the crease as he bunts this sharp-turning off break into the leg side, towards short midwicket
leans into the drive, gets to the pitch and eases this into the covers. Excellent start from Lyon
loose delivery and punished in some style! Short, wide, angling away and Pujara uses the width to flay that up and over point. Couple of bounces into the boundary.
gentle little bunt wide of cover and they were off for the single
touch ahead of length, angling away. Vihari has a good look as he leaves
hint of uncertainty this time, unsure whether to prod forward or hang back. Ends up defending this from the crease. Was playing besides the line this time
slants one full and across, Vihari lets it go
solidly defends this length ball into the point region
steps out and whips this back to Lyon

delightful extra cover drive. Walking out to get to the pitch and drives against the turn to pick the gap. 5th Indian to score 150 at the SCG. The marathon continues This is VVS Laxman-esque, terrific as he opened up the off side, getting besides the line to use the room and drive imperiously. This also raises the century stand
steps out, this one's thrown just a touch wide, drifted away late too, Pujara kicks it off with his pad
picks the length early, rocks back and cuts into the gap between cover and backward point
lunges forward and punches this into the covers

the umpire's finger went up no sooner than Lyon belted out an appeal. Vihari attempts a premeditated sweep, seemed to have missed it but well, not really. Just a little flick on the edge of the vat as it hit the biceps and lobbed to short leg. Looked good while he was there, will be kicking himself for missing out after doing all the hard work. India lose a review
driven hard into the covers, loud call of no as soon as he hit the ball.
too full on the pads, flicked to deep fine leg
full and tailing into the pads, flicked with the angle to deep backward square to get off the mark
gentle push into the off side as they scamper a run. Yes, scamper through. Pujara was off as soon as Lyon called even if it may have seemed a little tight at first
pushed into the covers again as Starc goes full and wide
on the pads, worked off his hip to fine leg. He'll also have a well-earned drink now.
length outside off from around the stumps, goes for the cut but ends up chopping it into the ground
a touch fuller around off at 88 kph, defended on the front foot
a similar line and length once again, comes forward and offers a dead-bat
length outside off, not much turn, left alone

length again, just outside off, punched off the back foot towards extra cover
full outside off from around the stumps and Pujara is quick to pounce on it, drives it past the mid-off fielder on his left
and again, for a moment I thought they were showing a replay, straight to extra cover this time though

short of length outside off, drops it towards cover-point for a quick single
length outside off, pushed towards covers from the front foot

a touch slower in the air, length outside off, Pant looks to push it on the off side, misses. An appeal for caught-behind. Not out, says the umpire but Paine wants to review it. Nothing on the HotSpot, nothing on the Snicko either and Pant survives

down the pitch to this length ball around off, works it towards short midwicket

angling on the pads from around the wicket, flicks this length ball towards square leg, a good stop by the fielder there prevents any runs
pitched up outside off, drives it towards sweeper cover for a single
an inswinging yorker at 150.6 kph. Pant does well to bring his bat down in time, taking it on the full and guess what it beats the mid-on fielder to the straight boundary
length ball on off and middle, turns it on the leg side
length on middle and leg, plays with the angle to the left of mid-on for a single
length around off, comes forward and defends it with soft hands

short of length outside off, rocks back and cuts it past point for four, moves to 165
fuller on the pads, swinging down, Pant looks to glance it away but the ball brushes the pads and races away towards the fine leg boundary
fuller again, this time around middle stump, a wristy flick towards square leg for one
length outside off, comes forward and pushes it towards cover
length ball from around the wicket but way outside off, left alone by Pujara
pitched up this time and much straighter, driven firmly but Starc intercepts in his followthrough
fuller around off and middle, driven to the left of mid-on for a quick single
length around off, Pujara comes forward and defends it on the leg side
length on middle and leg, goes back and flicks it to square leg
length again, a small step down and works it towards the left of square leg for a single

length outside off, skips down and pads it away

bounce nearly had him! Pujara is surprised by the delivery that takes off from a length outside off as he tried and steer this behind point.
shows the full face of the bat as he defends this incoming length ball back
gets forward and defends this full delivery to mid-on
dug in short but Pujara ducks under this without much fuss
allows this to angle in as he bunts this to the leg side
waits for the turn and punches this into the gap at cover
drifting into the pads, Pujara uses the depth of the crease to whip this away past short fine leg. Soldiers back for the third
drifts in and straightens on middle, Pant behind the line in defence
loop and turn from off stump, Pant doesn't bite the bait by going after that. Left alone
goes right back and across as he defends this indrifter from around the stumps
skids one through on a length on off, Pant plays for the turn but there isn't any, defended nonetheless
bunts this length delivery into the off side
slants a length delivery back in from wide of the crease, defended back
hint of width available but Pujara allows this to zip through to the keeper
uppish, may have been deceived by a slower delivery. Lobs over extra cover. Deep point runs around to cut that off.
gets right on top of the bounce and stabs it back down the pitch
hops back into the crease and punches this length ball to cover
nearly lobbed to short midwicket off an inside edge. Pant unsure of the turn from around the stumps
attempts an expansive sweep, gets a thick bottom edge past leg slip, retrieved by the short fine leg fielder close to the ropes
eased with the spin to short cover
stands tall and punches to long-off as they jog the single
turns this with the spin to square leg
steps out and whips this with the spin to deep midwicket

has he tickled this to the keeper? Just a spurt of excitement from Paine. Too short, spinning down leg again.
much better, fuller, drifting into middle, Pant defends to get an inside edge to short midwicket
shapes to cut but this spins in and bounces too, rolls back off the top part
steps out and works this wide of midwicket for an easy single
lunges forward and smothers this tossed up delivery
punched to sweeper cover
tickled fine, races away to the ropes there at fine leg. Cummins gave up halfway through
carefully allows this to spin back in as he defends.
steps out and works this past midwicket
driven into the gap at sweeper cover, Pujara called 'two two two' immediately, but then realised he may have hit it too well
struck on the pad as he plays all around it but it pitched outside leg
squeezes this full delivery into the gap at square leg
bunts this back to the bowler

length around off, defended on the front foot

fuller on the stumps, driven towards long-on for one

drills this straight to extra cover
padded away again as he gets outside the line

so he won't get a double century. This is beautiful bowling from Lyon, threw it up, drew him forward, got it to dip and straighten a hint. Pujara was looking to whip this into the leg side but this one didn't spin as much and ended up lobbing back to Lyon, who took a good, low catch. SCG stands up to applaud a superb knock.
bunts this into the off side.
tucks this gently off his hip to square leg.
dug in short on middle, Jadeja ducks under this
punched into the midwicket region as they scamper a single, Jadeja off the mark
full and slanting away, left alone. There was an invitation to drive

helps along to the fine leg boundary. Wasn't a full blooded pull even though he swiveled nicely, may have been mindful of a top-edge, looks like he bailed out of a hook but still got the desired result. Takes him one short of a third Test fifty
driven wide of cover as they jog the single
defended, rolls off the inner part of the bat to short leg.
punched down past short mid-on, they jog the single as Pant gets to his half-century
good stride forward as he smothers this nicely.

width on offer as he slants one across, left alone
gets on top of the bounce and defends

tickled fine, down to the man at long leg.

big appeal for lbw as he gets this to bend back in a long way from middle. This one kept a touch low as well, but Pant may have got a thin inside edge on this. Let's see. Replays confirm there was no bat, pitched in line so this was plumb . Sadly no reviews left. Okay, so now with Hawkeye, it says the call would've stayed with the umpire as the ball was just clipping the stumps.
looks to play, then leaves at the last moment as this zips through to Paine

drilled to the extra cover boundary like a? Complete the sentence for me, please. Cue: Ravi Shastri

awkward bounce, rising towards his ribcage, turned to square leg.
right behind the line as he bunts it into the off side

gets a thick outside edge to third man, was looking to punch this on the up
steered, but this is a good stop by Khawaja at gully
