looks to flip his blade and reverse ramp him over the keeper, beaten

full toss on the pads, whipped behind square to beat fine leg. 200 of the partnership comes up, he's batting now like he would in his colony against young kids. Looked like he was deceived initially as he nearly fell over, but then let his hands-eye coordination take over. Stunning
punched into the cover region, down to the sweeper.
steers this to short third man as they pinch a run
goes for a heave as he steps out, misses it completely and is bowled. Completely deceived in flight. With that wicket, India have also declared.
length on middle and angling in, pushed towards mid-on
short of length outside off, looks to punch it away from the body, chops it into the ground, looks back in horror as it just lobs over the stumps
short of length and gets the punch right this time, beats the point fielder. Off the mark with a boundary
length outside off, another back-foot punch, doesn't time it will this time, only a single to extra cover
length around off, in the channel, stays beside the line and defends it on the off side
a touch fuller and closer to the off stump, moves across and defends it in the direction of mid-on
length around off, looks to defend, the ball hits the outer half and goes towards gully
fuller around off, driven gently towards mid-on
fuller around off, moves across and tucks it away off his pads, gets a couple of runs to deep square leg
short of length outside off, defended on the off side from back foot
a short one, just outside off, Harris ducks under and sways away as well
short of length around off, guides it past gully, Rahane puts in the chase, pulls it just inside
short one on middle and leg, pulls it down towards fine leg
a touch fuller but way outside off, left alone by Khawaja
dropped by Pant, length around off, Khawaja pushes at it, gets a healthy edge that goes towards the left of Pant who moves across, goes for the catch and puts it down. Went through his hands
length outside off, and shouldered arms this time
fuller on the stumps, drives it on the front foot towards mid-on
length ball, pitching outside off and angling in, left alone
length around off, stays in the crease and defends it on the off side
length around off, comes forward and plays it towards mid-on
a bouncer, aimed at the batsman but Harris had no problem ducking under that one
fuller this time, just outside off, a solid punch but straight to mid-off
length outside off, some room there and guided away past the diving point fielder, off the front foot
length, angled on the stumps this time, defends it towards mid-on
and gets off the mark, length ball, angled on the pads, tucked away towards short midwicket for a quick single
a short one, just outside off, Harris gets on his toes and defends it down
fuller, angled on the stumps, Harris drives it wide of mid-on, gets a couple of runs
back of length around off, gets behind this one and blocks solidly
fuller around off, goes for the drive but couldn't beat the extra cover fielder
short of length outside off, punched off the back foot but couldn't beat Vihari at extra cover/mid-off region
length ball, on the stumps, tucks it towards mid-on
a touch fuller around off, pushed back towards the bowler
a sharp bouncer at almost 141kph, angling on middle and leg, Harris takes his eyes off and ducks under
short of length this time, comes slower off the surface, defended from the crease
back of length, rising towards the rib cage at 145kph, Harris dabs it behind square leg
fuller around off, pushed gently towards extra cover for a quick single
tossed up around off, driven towards mid-off
short of length outside off, drops it towards cover-point
length around off, defends it from the crease
length on middle and leg, defends it on the leg side
fuller around off, pushes it towards covers
slightly shorter this time, uses his feet to push it towards mid-on
fuller around middle, comes forward and turns it gently towards fine leg
pitched up around off, defended on the front foot
tossed up around 77.8kph, just outside off, defended from the crease
googly, fuller and skids on after pitching, Khawaja was playing back, gets an inside edge past stumps
length ball, stays in the crease and defends it on the off side
fuller around off, drives it to mid-off
fuller around off, steered towards short third man from front foot
length ball, uses his feet to push it back
length around off, stays beside the line and defends
length around off, some turn this time, comes forward and blocks
length, in the corridor, left alone
length outside off, punched off the back foot towards point
tossed up around off, drives it towards cover-point
length around off, defended on the off side
flighted on the stumps, comes forward and blocks
fuller on the stumps once again, dead-bats it from the front foot
flighted on a length around off, comes forward and defends again
no, in fact flatter and quicker well outside off, left alone by Khawaja
starts with a warm-up delivery, fuller around off, and check-driven past mid-off, won't go all the way but good enough for three
pulls his length back a bit, just outside off, defended on the back foot
length ball, angling in to the batsman to beat the bat and rap him high on the thigh, a polite enquiry from Bumrah for lbw, not out
length, in the channel, Khawaja shoulders arms
length in the corridor once more, Khawaja lets it go through
length, a tad wider this time and no response from the batsman again
fuller around off, comes forward and defends it solidly
fuller outside off, looks to drive, the ball takes the outer half and goes towards point
length around off, comes forward and taps it between cover and point for a single
fuller around off, and driven straight to extra cover, KL Rahul there
length this time, in the channel, Khawaja comes forward and shoulders arms
fuller and closer this time, Khawaja works it wide off mid-on for a single
length outside off, defended from the crease
a touch fuller, just outside off but Khawaja stays back and dead-bats it
short of length outside off, and he leaves it alone this time
length again, around fourth stump line, comes forward and blocks
length outside off, much closer to the stumps, blocked towards covers from the front foot
fuller in the corridor, left alone
fuller, just around the off stump, a firm front-foot drive but straight to mid-off
pitched up, on the stumps this time, punched straighter this time, Shami got some hand on it which meant the mid-on could come across to cut it off
short of length outside off this time, Khawaja likes to pull and needs no second invitation, swivels to pull it in front of square
length ball, in the corridor, left alone this time
length, just outside off, stayed a tad low, nothing much to worry about as of now, blocked from the crease
length around off, stays beside the line and defends it towards cover-point

did it carry? Harris jumps out the crease straightaway and looks to go aerial, mistimes it to the left of KL Rahul who puts in a full length dive from mid-on but it just lands short. Signals to the umpires straightaway
length around off, pushes it towards covers
doesn't miss out this time, short and some room outside off, punched off the back foot through cover-point
length ball, just around off, stays back and blocks
pitched up, almost too full, digs it out back towards the bowler
length outside off, punched straight to the point fielder this time
length ball, angling in from outside off, but still away from the stumps, left alone
aims to bowl a tad straight but ends up bowling on the pads, helped on its way to the fine-leg boundary
fuller outside off, driven on the front foot but straight to Rahul at extra cover
fuller outside off, driven past point this time, Jadeja with the chase, puts in the slide to keep it to two
short of length this time, but on middle and leg, Khawaja won't mind that, tucks it away towards deep square leg
crisp shot, wasn't a half-volley but Harris came forward and drove it on the up, beating Rahul at extra cover for four more
fuller around off and Khawaja goes down on one knee to sweep it behind square
fuller around off, comes forward and pushes it gently towards mid-off
down the wicket, Jadeja shortens his length but Harris keeps his cool and caresses it through covers
fuller on the stumps and flicked with lot of wrist there, Kohli makes a partial stop at short midwicket
Kahwaja joins in, skips down the track and lofts it over mid-off, they have decided not to let Jadeja dictate terms
fuller around off, pushed on the off side from the front foot
flighted on off stump, and Harris' front-foot drive is bunted right into the pitch. Lobs into the air, and Kuldeep collects
full on off, and Harris allows the ball to come to him, before driving to mid on
flat, wide outside off and spinning further away. He rocks back, and carves a square cut to the sweeper-fielder on the off side
length ball on middle, and turning away slightly. Defended off the back foot
full outside off stump, and spinning away further. Driven off the front foot to cover
length ball outside off again, and punished by Harris. Forces Shami - from extra cover - to give it a chase, but he can't cut the ball off
full outside off, and reverse swept to short third man. Finds the fielder
overpitched just outside off, and he prods forward to defend
full outside off, and he reverse sweeps this exquisitely to the backward-point boundary. To the pitch of the ball early, and he rolls his wrists to keep the ball along the ground
full on off stump, and he skips down the ground to check-drive down to wide long on
length ball just outside off, and carved off the back foot to point. They scamper across for one
extra flight, wider outside off. Khawaja gets to the pitch of the ball in a bid to pad it away, but the ball misses his legs and finds itself in Pant's gloves
full on off stump, and played against the spin down the ground. Intercepted by Kuldeep on his followthrough
flighted on leg stump, and clipped off his toes to deep midwicket. Just past the diving Virat Kohli
full just outside off and turning away, defended off the front foot
full outside off, but drifting inwards in the air. He skips down the wicket, and toe-ends a drive to cover
tossed up on off stump, and he presses forward to block
full on off, and drifting inwards again. Driven from near his toes to cover once more
overpitched on off from round the wicket, and driven to cover. Mistimed this time
length ball outside off, and he shapes up to play the square cut. Too close to his body, and mistimed to point
slower ball, almost a yorker on off stump, but Harris is up to the challenge. Doesn't commit early, and defends off the front foot
length ball outside off, and he uses his wrists to check-punch off the back foot. Stopped by cover point
length ball on off stump, and angling inwards. Flicked off the back foot to midwicket
full on middle, and nudged off the front foot to deep midwicket once again
extra flight, lands very full on middle stump. Dug away by Khawaja off the front foot
full on leg stump, and he uses his wrists to flick straight past the non-striker to mid on. Whipped off his toes
full just outside off, but Khawaja skips down the wicket to convert it into a full toss. Driven well, but stopped by the fielder at cover
full outside off, and the wrong'un is driven down the ground to mid off
full outside off, and turns away from the left-handed batsman. Pushed off the front foot to cover
full outside off stump, and he skips down the wicket to slog. Mistimed to the leg side, and that's been pocketed by the fielder! First wicket, and that's Kuldeep's reward right away
back of a length on off stump, and flicked off the back foot to deep midwicket. Enough time to jog back for the second run
full and wide outside off, and he leans forward to play the cover drive. The ball dribbles away to deep point
yorker first ball! 146 kph, and lands at the base of off stump. The batsman will feel lucky his toes are still with him. Dug away uncomfortably
full ball angling in, and he presses forward to defend back to Bumrah
length ball angling inwards, and he shuffles towards the off side, before flicking to wide mid-on
slower ball, length delivery just outside off and angling in. Defended off the front foot
full outside off, and spinning inwards. Defended off the back foot
full on off stump, and he skips down the ground to toe-end a drive. Stopped by Kohli at cover
length ball outside off, and spinning further away. Stays on the back foot, and cuts to deep point
full just outside off, and spinning inwards. Defended off the front foot to cover
full outside off, and he slaps a square drive after getting to the pitch of the ball. Can't pierce the infield though
full just outside off stump, and he presses forward to block. Confidently negated
length ball on middle and angling across the batsman. Cut off the back foot to deep point, and that's his second Test fifty!. Crowd appreciates his fluent innings
length ball outside off stump, and angling in very sharply. Labuschagne opts to shoulder his arms after covering his off stump
length ball on off and angling in again. Ball stays low, forcing Labuschagne to bend his knees before defending towards the leg side
length ball outside off, and he opens the bat's face to run a check-drive down to third man. Jadeja gives it a chase
overpitched on middle and leg, and he has no trouble in flicking square past the umpire to the man in the deep
attempted yorker that ends up as a low full toss. Aimed at middle stump, and bunted away to mid on. Drinks
full on off, and he clears his front leg to play the inside-out drive. Chase for the man at cover, and they comfortably come back for the second run
full on middle, and this time he muscles a cover drive through the infield. Hardik puts in a desperate effort in the deep, but he can't pull it back. Slides into the boundary rope
overpitched outside off stump, and turning inwards. Driven to mid on, but mistimed
full on off, and he drags this towards the leg side. Smacks this with the spin to the right of mid on, but a diving effort saves the boundary
length ball on off stump, and he rocks back to defend
full on middle, and staying low. He rocks back with soft hands, and blocks this away to the leg side
length ball outside off stump, and blocked off the back foot
full outside off, and blocked off the front foot
full just outside off, and he presses forward to defend
length ball outside off, and spinning inwards. Blocked off the front foot
length ball outside off, and zipping straight through to the keeper. No shot offered
length ball on off, and he flicks this away to square leg for a jogging single
flighted just outside off stump, and he takes a big stride forward to defend
full outside off, and turning away from Harris. He uses the depth of the crease, before cutting square to point
full just outside off, and Harris skips down the wicket before lifting this right over mid on! Off the bat's middle, super safe shot
flighted outside off, and he comes down the ground to drive. Mistimed to mid off
flatter on off, and the half-tracker is pulled away with disdain! Stays on the back foot, spots the length early, and punishes this towards the cow-corner boundary

full outside off stump, and he comes down the wicket again! Slogs against the turn, and gets enough behind that shot to beat mid on! In the air for a moment, but wide enough from the fielder at mid-on. Expensive over, reminiscent of Labuschagne's first against Pujara
flatter, length ball wide outside off. Angling in, and defended towards point with the angled bat
full on off, drifting in with Jadeja's shoulder from round the wicket. Defended
full ball outside off, and he presses forward to block. Gentle hands, with silly mid-off lurking
full outside off, and the cover drive is intercepted by Kohli attacking from cover
full just outside off, and he takes a big stride forward to drive. Straight back to Jadeja
full on middle stump, and he reaches forward to bunt the ball away to the leg side
length ball wide outside off, and turning further away . Harris shoulders his arms
full on middle stump, and he takes a big stride forward to defend
full just outside off, and he skips down the ground to drive past Kuldeep's right. Dribbles down to long off as Australia collect their 100th run
full outside leg stump, and flicked fine, forcing Rahul from point to give it a chase. Stopped well inside the boundary
full outside off, and spinning away very sharply. Ripper, and tapped away off the back foot to point
length ball, very wide outside off, and he slaps a cut shot to deep extra cover for a walking single
full just outside off stump, and turning inwards. Defended back to Jadeja
length ball outside off, and spinning inwards. Defended towards mid on off the back foot
full outside off, and driven past Jadeja's right to mid off. The bowler did try to cut it off by diving, but the ball just went past him
length ball outside off, and he waits for the ball to come to him, before carving a late cut past short third man
full just outside off stump, and he presses forward with soft hands to block
full just outside off stump, and he opens the bat's face to nudge this towards the off side
full outside off stump, and turning away from the batsman. Harris leaves it alone
full outside off stump, and he skips down the ground to drive to mid off. Vihari there near the boundary
full just outside off, and defended down the ground to the bowler
full outside off, and skidding straight through. Flicked to mid-on
tossed up on off stump, and he drives down the ground to mid off. Fielder intercepts
full on leg stump, and swept away for four! Trying to bowl the wrong'un, but it's overpitched, and Labuschagne makes no mistake in putting it away
full just outside off stump, and he takes a big stride forward to defend
full on off stump, and turning into the batsman. Driven down the ground to long on for a jogging single
full just outside off stump, and he presses forward to defend. Played towards the off side
length ball, teasingly lands just outside off stump. Turns further away, and the extra bounce forces the batsman to leave the ball
full just outside off, and he crunches a cover drive straight to Kohli. Just on the bounce
darted on middle stump, and going down the leg side. Flicked off the back foot to deep backward square
length around off, defended from the crease
length ball on the pads, looks to flick but misses, the ball goes to the left of Pant off the pad. A gentle appeal from Shami for lbw but was going down
length around off, stays beside the line and defends it towards point
short of length, in the channel, but left all alone. Good carry to the keeper though
fuller this time, around off, Labuschagne plants his front foot across and works it towards short midwicket. Early signs of reverse swing there
length around off, comes forward and defends
uses his feet and takes it on the full, worked towards short midwicket
tossed up around off, at 78 kph, comes forward and blocks
short of length and some room outside off, cuts it towards sweeper cover
slower again, a touch fuller outside off, smothered on the front foot
was that a wrong'un, yes looked like, length around off, Labuschagne was looking to defend on the back foot, the ball hits the outer half and rolls on the off side
fuller on the stumps, turned away on the leg side
perfect line and length from Shami, pitching around middle and leg and just leaving the batsman from a good length, Harris looks to defend and gets beaten
a similar line but slightly shorter this time, defended from the back foot with a straight bat
a touch fuller and wider this time, punches it through covers, his most productive area this innings, gets a couple and moves to 71 - his highest Test score so far
fuller on the stumps and flicked away towards the left of mid-on
a bouncer this time, aimed at the batsman, Labuschagne ducks under as the ball sails way over
length around off, comes forward and blocks
tossed up wide outside off, Harris skips down and slaps it towards long-off
fuller outside off, goes for the sweep and finds short leg, Vihari there cops one on the inner part of the thigh, he looks in some discomfort there
fuller again, another sweep, into the ground and lobs on the leg side
length outside off, moves across and looks to block, it turns in sharply to beat the bat, a big appeal for lbw but the impact was outside off
another sweep and this time he would get a single to deep square leg
use his feet to take this on the full, eases it away towards long-on
length around off, comes forward and blocks
a bouncer on middle and leg, a controlled pull by Harris down to fine leg
length, in the corridor, moved a bit away from the batsman who leaves it alone
this one comes back from a similar line and length, a big stride forward by Labuschagne before shouldering arms
a slower one perhaps, at 127kph, fuller around off, comes forward and pushes it towards mid-off
length ball, around sixth stump, left alone by Harris
length outside off, in the corridor, and left alone

length again, just around off, comes forward and drops it towards extra cover, Jadeja charges towards the ball from mid-off but couldn't gather it properly, too many ifs there but a direct hit would have been interesting
length around off, stays back and pushes it towards cover
length, pitching around middle and off, angling across the batsman, Harris leaves it alone
a touch fuller this time, Harris gets forward and angles it behind point for one
almost a yorker, just outside off, but Labuschagne is equal to it, jams his bat to keep it out
length around off, stays beside the line and steers it behind point, 50-run stand comes up with that single
short of length, in the line of the stumps, Labuschagne is behind the line of the ball, gets his bat down just in time as this one rises only around knee height or so
fuller on the stumps, the front foot once again went across but the bat comes in front to block it, there was definitely some reverse swing into the right-hander
length around off, comes forward to defend, the ball rolls towards cover-point off the outer half
length, around fifth stump, was looking to play at it initially but leaves it alone in the end, a wise decision
short of length, nipping back in around off and middle, Labuschagne is behind this and blocks it on the leg side
length ball, gentle delivery, and defended off the back foot
full just outside off, and blocked
full outside off, and he leans forward to drive. Stopped at mid off
length ball just outside off, and he bends his knees, before tapping it away to cover off the back foot
full outside off stump, and he takes a big stride forward to block. Pushed away to cover
tossed up wide outside off, and he slaps a square drive through the infield. Vihari gives it a chase, but he can't parry it back. Crashes into the boundary
overpitched just outside off, and he shuffles across to the off side, before clipping a shot in front of square. Misfielded by Pujara at midwicket
length ball outside off, and he prods forward to block towards cover. Off the bat's middle
length ball wide outside off, and Labuschagne shoulders his arms after covering his off stump
length ball, wide outside off stump. Once again, left alone
full, and very wide outside off stump. Labuschagne doesn't chase after it. Left alone
full and wide outside off stump once again. Zipping straight through with Labuschagne protecting his off-stump with a big stride forward. Straight through to Pant
length ball on off, and skidding through. Blocked off the back foot, straight to Jadeja
length ball on off, and he makes room, before check-punching to cover
extra flight, full outside off stump. Harris skips down the wicket and punches to mid off
length ball on leg stump, and he flicks this away off his hips. Finds midwicket though
tossed up wide outside off, and Harris adjusts his skip down the wicket after seeing the ball delivered away from him. Pushes it away to cover

played on! Oh dear, Harris what have you done? Jadeja gives out a roar as Harris stands there gobsmacked. Length ball outside off, and Harris tries to play a square cut late, but the ball stays slightly low, takes the under-edge off his bat, and then clips the top of leg stump. Applause for Harris as he makes his way back
length ball, wide outside off, and left alone by the batsman. Bumrah looking for the ball coming in, but the delivery stayed it's course
length ball wide outside off, and this time Labuschagne goes chasing after it! Sticks his bat out in a bid to cut square, but the ball whizzes over his bat
full, but wide outside off stump. The delivery takes a banana-bounce into Pant's gloves as the batsman lets it go through
length ball angling into his body, and tucked away - off his hips - to the leg side. Pujara at midwicket intercepts with a tumbling effort. Bumrah claps for the effort
back of a length on middle, and the ball soars over the batsman's head. Ducked early after spotting the length
full and wide outside off stump, enticing Labuschagne to drive. But he doesn't
length ball, wide outside off, and tapped off the back foot to Jadeja
full just outside off, and he presses forward to defend towards cover
tossed up just outside off, drifting away in the air. Lands near Marsh's toes, and he hammers a toe-ended drive to mid off
full on off stump, and Marsh prods forward to block
serene! Full just outside off, and he skips down the ground, before driving through the covers. Enough width for the shot, and that allows Marsh to swing the bat through the delivery's line
full just outside off, and defended off the front foot. Ball rolls away to Jadeja
attempted yorker, that's extremely full on leg stump. Ball goes further down the leg side, and Pant does really well to collect the ball, outstretched to his left
length ball on off stump, and he defends off the front foot from near his face. Ball was rising, but well negated by Labuschagne
full outside off, and angling in, but Labuschagne presses forward to block. Played really low, bat's face pointed towards the pitch
back of a length on middle, and that hurries onto the batsman. Manages to duck under the ball, though
back of a length on middle, but this one doesn't bounce as much. Labuschagne, however, isn't taking chances. Ducks under the ball
full outside off stump, and he leans into a very good-looking cover drive. Crunched, but intercepted by Kohli
overpitched just outside off, and he shovels a defensive shot back to Jadeja
length ball just outside off, and turning inwards. Nudged away to midwicket
full outside off stump, and he takes a big stride forward to defend. Bat-padded towards the off side
length ball wide outside off, and he shuffles towards the delivery before defending
full and wide outside off, and he caresses a cover drive through the infield! Pujara chaperones the ball to the boundary
full just outside off, and gently pushed back to Jadeja off the front foot
length ball angling in from outside off, and defended off the front foot to cover. Gently played to the off side
full on middle, and clipped off his toes to the leg side. The ball swung in late

full outside off, and he leans forward to smack a cover drive through the infield! Plays with the bat's face at a 45-degree angle, and the regulation half-volley is sent to the boundary. Mayank, at cover, dived over the ball though
yorker on off stump, and dug away by shuffling across the stumps. Played towards short midwicket
full on middle, and he works it off his pads to the leg side. Delivery angling in once again
full on off, and he absolutely creams a leg-side flick that beats midwicket. Jadeja gives it a chase, and he's a fast runner, but the ball has the legs to beat him in this race
and an easy catch at first slip. Length around off, Marsh hangs his bat out, perhaps playing for spin but it holds its line and Rahane takes it around knee-height to his left
fuller around off, leans forward to block
length outside off, some bounce there for Jadeja left alone
flatter around off this time, comes forward and blocks
fuller, just outside off, pushes it on the off side
short of length, pitching way outside off and spinning, left alone carefully
tailing in this one from outside off, ends up as almost a yorker at off, Labuschagne jams his bat at it
fuller once again, just around off this time, brings his bat in front of pad and defends it on the leg side
length around off, going away this one, defended tentatively, away from the body, on the off side
short of length outside off, Labuschagne goes up and over the gully region, gets a boundary with that adventurous shot
fuller on middle, clips it to squarer of two short midwickets, Kohli there
fuller around off this time, Labuschagne comes forward and drives at back, Shami bends in his followthrough to make the stop
length outside off, Head moves across and works it towards short midwicket
a touch fuller around off, comes forward and blocks
flatter this time, at 91kph, defended back though not from the middle
back of length outside off, stands tall and blocks it again
fuller this time, leans forward and defends
pitched up outside off, drives it towards covers
short of length outside off, plays away from the body, steering it towards point
fuller on the stumps, presents the full face of the bat and it races away down the ground, even the quick Jadeja from mid-on couldn't stop it
length this time, in the line of the stumps, gets behind the line of the ball and defends with a vertical bat

what a catch, finally the trap works. Rahane getting both hands, low to his right, at the squarer short midwicket. Was fuller on the pads, Labuschagne failed to keep the flick down and Rahane, you beauty!
length ball on the pads, tucked away behind square leg to get off the mark
fuller on the pads and he flicks it towards square leg, he too is off the mark
length on middle and leg, works it towards square leg for one
length around off, comes down the wicket, nowhere near the pitch of the ball, pushes it towards cover-point
fuller around off, lunges forward this time and smothers it, much better
length on middle and leg, use of feet once again, defends it on the leg side
length but way outside off this time, leaves it alone
length around off, stays back and keeps it out with a straight bat
length around off, gets behind the line and defends
back of length outside off, defended towards covers from the back foot
fuller, on the pads, glances it away towards fine leg
back of length around off, gets behind the line and offer a dead-bat
length around off, tailing back in after landing, left alone by the batsman
short of length around off, Handscomb gets on the top of the bounce and defends it into the surface
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks it
pitched up again, driven towards mid-on from the front foot
short of length outside off, goes back and punches it towards covers, gets a single
use of feet once again by Handscomb, pushes at it, gets a thick outside edge towards cover-point
a touch fuller, Handscomb pushes at it, gets an outside edge but well short of Rahane at slip
short of length, just outside off, goes back and punches it towards covers
full outside off, and the ball stays low! Head looks to defend, but pulls his bat up late, eventually shouldering his arms
full on leg stump, and clipped away off the front foot to square leg. Stopped by Rahul there
length ball on leg stump, and nudged away to square leg once again. Perilously close to Kohli at midwicket
full on middle, and flicked away off his pads to the sweeper-fielder at deep midwicket
length ball on leg stump, and nudged off his hips to Rahul at fine leg. They walk across for one
length ball on middle, and angling slightly away. Head walks across to the off side, and fends from near his chest
appeal for lbw but not given! Jadeja was convinced, but that's bat-pad. Full on middle and angling into his legs. Handscomb comes forward to defend
full just outside off stump, and nudged straight to mid-on
length ball, flatter on off. He goes onto the back foot, and flicks off his pads to midwicket
length ball just outside off, and nudged off the back foot, rather craftily. Chase for Pujara at midwicket
full ball, wide outside off, and straightening after pitching. Handscomb takes a big stride forward and then shoulders his arms
full outside off once again, gripping off the surface and going through. Left alone once again
short ball from round the wicket, and Head ducks under the ball's line. A well-aimed delivery
length ball outside off, and he carves a cut to Rahul at cover point. Head wants the single, but Handscomb says 'no'
full outside off, and seaming inwards slightly. Head covers his off stump and shoulders his arms
length ball angling into his pads, and flicked square off the back foot. Well hit, but the diving square-leg fielder ensures it's a dot
full on off, and angling inwards. Nudged off his pads to Rahul at square leg again
full outside off, and he leans into a cover drive! Pierces the gap between cover and mid off, and Jadeja is off to give it a chase
full outside off, and prods forward to defend
full just outside off stump, and tapped with gentle hands towards the off side
full just outside off, and he comes forward to defend with soft hands. Pant seems excited with Jadeja's line and length
tossed up just outside off stump, and he takes a big stride forward to meet the ball on the full
full on off, and he leans forward to defend. Pant can't control his happiness for some reason
full on middle, and he takes a big stride forward to defend with gentle hands. Ball rolls away to the non-striker as Pant goes 'oye Jaddu!'
full outside off, and he slaps a cover drive... straight to the fielder
full outside off, and spinning away from Head. He leans forward before shouldering his arms
full on off, and he carefully comes forward to defend. Keeps his eyes on the ball at all times
length ball on off, and Head backs away trying to cut. Mistimed towards Kohli at cover point
extra flight outside off, and Head uses his wrists to drive through the off side. No real power behind that shot, easily stopped at cover
length ball outside off, and spinning away. Enough width to pull, and he drags this shot, along the ground, to the cow-corner boundary
length ball outside off, and punched off the back foot to cover. Can't pierce the infield
full on off stump, and he presses forward to defend. Ball rolls back to the bowler
full on off stump, and he drives against the spin to midwicket. Mistimed
full on middle, and darted into his pads. Flicked off his pads to short fine leg
length ball just outside off stump, and he stays on the back foot to defend. Played towards the off side
a low full toss on the stumps and driven past between the bowler and the non-striker
fuller outside off this time and driven towards covers
pitched up around off, drives it to extra cover
length around off, slaps it towards covers
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks
short of length outside off, cuts it away towards sweeper cover
fuller around off, pushes it towards extra cover
length this time, just outside off, goes back and punches it towards extra cover
pitched up and driven towards extra cover
fuller once more, just outside off, comes forward and pushes it to covers
length ball, leans forward and drops it towards covers for a quick single
fuller outside off and drives it through covers, Shami gives the chase but fails to prevent the boundary
starts with a length ball on the pads, tucked away towards square leg
fuller around off, comes forward and defends it down the wicket
length around off, Handscomb presents the full face of the bat, a partial stop at extra cover
fuller around off, driven towards mid-on off the front foot, a tumbling stop to his right by the fielder
short of length on middle and leg, tucked away towards square leg
fuller again, just outside off, Head moves across and drives it to the left of mid-on for a boundary
length ball and spinning on the pads, flicked away behind square for a couple
length ball, once again on middle and leg, tucked away towards backward square leg
fuller this time, Handscomb uses his feet to drive it towards mid-off, sneaks in a quick single
fuller around off, Head lunges forward to block
flatter and quicker, keeps a little low as well but way outside off, Head leaves it alone
tossed up around off, Head goes for the drive, was in the air for a while but all in the gap, a single to deep extra cover
length ball, angling on the stumps, defended in front of the pads, towards long-on
fuller on the stumps and flicked away, a diving, one-handed stop to his right by Rahul at square leg
length around off, angling towards the stumps once again, defended on the front foot
length around off, comes forward and blocks
length ball, outside off, stays beside the line and defends it towards cover-point
a yorker, but outside the line of the off stump, Handscomb opens the face of the bat to steer between the gully and the slip
fuller around off, leans forward and blocks it
caught and bowled! Comes down the track, takes it on the full and hits it right back at the bowler. Didn't middle it, more of the toe-end of the bat and a good knee-high catch by Kuldeep
fuller, outside off, Paine comes forward and defends
length around off, defended on the front foot once again
slower in the air, 78.9 kph, beats the bat as Paine looks to defend again. But the impact is outside off
on the stumps this time, Paine was already moving towards the off stump, ends up chipping it towards square leg. Well short of incoming Shami
length ball, just around the off stump, Handscomb stays in his crease and blocks
an attempted yorker but ends up as a high full toss on the stumps, pushed towards mid-off for a run
a nasty bouncer, angling towards the head, Paine almost in a tangle but takes the bottom hand off and plays it down
another short one, this time outside off, sways away from the line
short again, down the leg side and pulled fine, beats the fielder at fine leg
no slower one here, it's fuller on the stumps, clipped towards deep square leg
length ball from round the wicket, and lands wide outside off. Spins inwards sharply, and he defends off the back foot to the leg side
full outside off, and this time he stretches forward to defen
flatter, lands on off and turns into Paine. Nudged off the back foot to the leg side
length ball wide outside off, and coming in with the arm. Blocked off the front foot, gentle hands on display
full on off stump, much straighter from Kuldeep. Defended with the straight bat, back to the bowler

through him! Extra flight and turn earns Kuldeep the reward. Full outside off, and Paine tries to play an expansive drive. The ball dips sharply, and he's done in by that. Ball whizzes through his defense, and then rattles his stumps. Kuldeep strikes first over after tea
full just outside off, and seaming inwards. Defended after coming into the front foot
length ball angling in from outside off. He stays on the back foot, and defends with gentle hands
length ball outside off, and the ball seams inwards. Left alone
yorker right at the base of off stump, but Handscomb is up to the challenge. Walks into the delivery and wedges it away to the off side
length ball, wide outside off, and Handscomb pulls his bat back after stretching forward. Through to Pant
full outside off stump, and defended away from his body to cover. Ball rolls away to the fielder there
full outside off stump, from round the wicket. Stretches forward to defend
length ball outside off, but spinning inwards with Cummins defending. Hits his front leg, and Kuldeep appeals for lbw but impact was outside the stumps
full on middle stump, and the ball stays slightly low. Tapped away to midwicket
quicker ball, full outside off, and he skips down the wicket to smother the turn towards the leg side
full on off, and Handscomb skips down the wicket once again. Nudged to midwicket
full on middle stump, and Handscomb gets to the pitch of the ball to defend
full on leg stump, and Cummins tries to tap this away towards the leg side, but the ball hits his front leg
appeal for caught at silly point but not given. Full on middle and skids straight through. Cummins misses the defense and the ball lobs up after hitting his pad
full outside off, and big stride forward to drive through the covers!
full on middle stump, and defended with soft hands to the leg side
full on middle, and he goes onto the back foot for a flick off his pads. Square leg cleans up
full just outside off stump, and he reaches the pitch of the ball to block
full outside off, and played with the spin to the leg side. Nudged to the vacant square-leg region for a quick run
full outside off, and this is the wrong'un! Spins away from Cummins, and the front-foot defense takes the outside edge to first slip
full on off, and he looks to play this towards the leg side. Ball hits his front leg, and lobs up, and short leg collects. Soft appeal for caught turned down
half-tracker on off, and Cummins spots the length early. Rocks back, real deep into his crease, and then muscles a pull into the deep midwicket boundary
extra flight outside off, and Cummins can't resist. Tries to drive away from his body, but the turn into his body forces an error. Through him, and Pant collects
length ball, wide outside off, but turning inwards. Nudged towards the leg side, and the ball hits his glove but falls short of short leg
full on middle, and skidding through. Minimal footwork from Handscomb, but he manages to play it towards square leg
full on off, and Handscomb takes a big stride forward to bunt this delivery
full on off stump, and he reaches to the ball to defend. Jadeja misses the collection, and mid-off eventually cleans up
full on off, and Handscomb goes deep before coming forward in a bid to defend. Comfortably played in the end
full on middle this time, and Handscomb closes his bat's face to play towards the on-side
full on middle, and blocked off the front foot to see the over out
full and wide outside off, and he defends with the bat's open face to Umesh at point. Handscomb wants the single, but Cummins refuses
full outside off stump, and he bunts this away with a big stretch forwards
overpitched outside off, and he carves a square drive through the infield. Jadeja runs after it, but all he can do is retrieve the cherry from the boundary rope
length ball outside off, and played with the spin to the leg side. Nudged off the backfoot to midwicket
extra flight outside off, and Cummins tries to defend, but the ball spins in sharply, takes his inside edge, and flies past the fielder lurking at short leg
full outside off stump, and Cummins goes across the stumps to the off side and blocks with soft hands
full on middle stump, and he stretches forward to turn the ball towards the leg side
full on middle stump, and he defends with a full-stretched bunt
full on middle, and that's been clipped away past the vacant midwicket region, and Umesh has to give it another chase
length ball on middle, and worked off the back foot to square leg. Played off his hips, and short fine leg runs after it
full on middle, and defended off the front foot with soft hands. Ball rolls away to cover
full on middle, and blocked towards the leg side after coming forward
full outside off stump, and he skips down the wicket before smothering this towards the leg side
overpitched on middle stump, and nudged off his toes to the leg side. Well stopped by Rahul under the helmet at short leg
beauty! Length ball outside off, and the wrong'un goes straight through. Tries to defend for the ball that spins inwards, and the ball just whizzes past his outside edge
length ball outside off, and this one doesn't bounce as much. Handscomb carefully works it towards the leg side
flatter, on middle and turning inwards. Flicked off his hips to square leg, but fielder placed there
flighted outside off, and he skips down the wicket to convert into a full toss. Smacked straight to mid off
length around off, Cummins comes forward and blocks
length again, in the line of the stumps this time, blocked
comes forward and blocks another length ball in front of his pads
length on middle and leg, turns it on the on side
length again, on the pads, tucks it towards square leg
fuller on the stumps, clears his front leg and hits it past Jadeja, beats the chasing mid-on
length ball, Handscomb comes down the track, beaten in the flight but just manages to work it towards fine leg
length ball, spinning big from outside off, Handscomb was deep in his crease, gets hit on the pads, a couple of leg-byes to fine leg
length, on middle and spinning down, flicked towards short fine leg
shorter in length this time, Handscomb was down the track, pushes it towards short midwicket
length again, goes back and plays it towards square leg with the spin
tossed up but down the leg side, Cummins sweeps it hard and fine, beats the short fine leg for four
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks
length ball, on middle and leg, flicks it towards square leg
length again, just around off this time, nudges it towards short midwicket from the front foot
length around off, a big stride forward to push it back towards Jadeja
length around off, defended on the front foot once again
fuller on the stumps, pushed gently towards short extra cover, a partial stop and mid-off cuts off the deflection
length ball, spinning down the leg side, tucked towards leg slip
length around off, comes forward and soft hands it, the spin takes the ball towards short leg
length ball, turn and bounce, goes back to flick, misses and gets hit high on the thigh
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks
tossed up outside off, lunges forward, the ball rolls towards leg slip off the bat
back of length, spinning on middle and leg, pushed towards square leg
length outside off, punched off the back foot but straight to cover
flatter and quicker, just around off, Handscomb was playing back but manages to get his bat down
length around off, lunges forward and pushes it on the off side
length ball, goes deep and flicks it towards short midwicket
fuller on the stumps, pushes back towards Jadeja
length around off, a big stride forward to block it again
length ball, spinning in, defended from the back foot towards mid-on
flighted outside off, comes forward to defend, the ball spins in goes towards short leg

through bat and pad, but away from the stumps, was tossed up outside off, a touch fuller drawing Cummins forward who pushes at it, keeps a bit low as well, Pant fails to stop it, four byes to the total
flighted outside off once again, Cummins doesn't miss out this time, drives it firmly though covers
slower again, comes forward and pushes, a thick outside edge falls short of Rahane at first slip
flighted on the stumps, defended with bat in front of the pad
fuller on the stumps, lunges forward and defends
length ball on middle and leg, flicks it away but straight to short fine leg

length again, goes back but misses the flick and gets struck on the pad, a huge appeal from Jadeja for lbw, Kohli opts for the review after confirming with his players there was no bat involved. Might be going down, and yes, says replay. Impact was umpire's call, just on the leg stump but was going further down and missing the stumps. India lose the review
a teeny tiny full toss, outside leg stump, and Handscomb taps it straight to midwicket. That's nice
lobs it up on middle, Handscomb blocks it
stretches forward to defend the slow, tossed up delivery on middle. And that's the end of the Jadeja over from last night
starts it all off with a bouncer down leg. Cummins gets the perfect sighter to get himself going
another short ball that wanders down leg, demanding a full-length dive from Pant. That should get him loosened up after the long break

keeps low! The moment he gets his radar right, he has the breakthrough. Shami and his big heart get the luck they need. India get the early wicket they want. Cummins - possibly the best of the Australian batsmen - is gone. He really had no hope with this ball. Pitches short of a length and scoots through under his bat even as he tries desperately to bring it down quickly enough in front of off stump
greets the new batsman with a bouncer, and since he's a left-hander, this one ships through across him. Starc lets it go
back of a length, at the pads of Starc, he deflects it away to long leg
there it is. Short and angled down leg. Handscomb won't have to play those. At least not in this format
creams it down the ground! He responds to the pitched-up delivery with his hands, an instinctive push from Starc without his feet moving too much. Somehow he manages to time the pants off it
and the next ball, is of course, the short ball. Climbing up towards the peak of Starc's helmet. The batsman gets up on his toes and blunts it towards cover
another bouncer, angling across the left-hander, searching for his glove. Starc manages to just about avoid the trap. Hostile!
the banged-in ball wanders away down leg, even Pant's acrobatics nowhere near enough to wrangle it down
back of a length on off stump, Starc's behind it
beats the edge as Bumrah gets the left-hander forward, playing the on-the-up drive. Tiny bit of nip off the pitch after the rain

strikes him on the body, somewhere near the hip, as Starc is slow to bring his bat around to meet the shortish delivery cramping him on leg stump. That's the problem left-handers face against Bumrah. They think the ball will always go across and then this happens...
back of a length and outside off, he blocks
looks for the yorker, but doesn't get it quite right. Handscomb is forward with a push to extra cover
short and outside off, Handscomb has no trouble knocking it down
floats it up there, seeing if he'll be willing to drive away from the body. Nope, says Handscomb. Not today

keeps low again! Shami's banging it into the pitch and it's responding to all his wiles. Handscomb is jumping back in his crease, expecting it to come up around his hips, but instead it sneaks down towards his shins. Just about makes contact
well, there we go. That's normal. The short ball coming up above stump height and being defended with no trouble
pitches it up outside off, Starc drives to mid-off

falls short of Bumrah as he moves to his left in his followthrough. The back of a length delivery holds up just a touch - enough to secure a bit of leading edge from Starc as he tries to flick the ball off his thighs
waits a fraction of a second more on this short ball at his hips and puts it away behind square leg
goes round the wicket and immediately looks more of a threat. The ball is homing in on the stumps - and Starc's pads - pitched up and menacing. A straight bat comes down just in time
bouncer, angled into the left-hander, searching for his ribs. Starc ducks out of danger
short of a length and outside off, no shot
comes round the wicket for a good length ball spinning into Handscomb. The batsman moves back, clears the front leg and flicks to midwicket
reads the flight on this early, lunges forward, head over the ball, hands on top of it as he sweeps behind square leg. Solid shot. And that forces India to put a man back to prevent the shot
steps out of his crease but Kuldeep makes it dip, and sharply at that. With short leg and leg slip waiting, Handscomb has to be careful to keep it down

this is too short and on this slow pitch, Handscomb has all the time he needs to rock back and whip it through midwicket. It does turn, perhaps a little more than he expects, but he's able to adjust because he's watching the ball so closely
comes down the pitch to the googly on off stump and hits it back at the bowler
quicker and shorter and on leg stump as well. Handscomb nudges it to long leg
back of a length and outside off, lets it go
shortish and outside off, no interest from Handscomb again
rises with the bounce on this delivery outside off and runs it to point

drags it on! Handscomb swipes at the air. Bumrah screams with joy. Australia fading away. This is that nagging line, on and around the off stump, trapping the batsman in his crease. It might have kept low a touch too. Certainly has him playing a little later than he should have and the inside edge knocks over the stumps. Joint-highest wicket-taker for the series
beats the outside edge with a short ball that hits the deck and zips through past Lyon
good length on middle and off, Lyon pushes it down the ground
tosses it up from over the wicket outside off. Starc leaves it
drifts into middle, which is to Starc's liking as he gets forward and flicks through to deep midwicket
googly which Lyon doesn't pick. He comes forward to block, looking for it to spin into him, and is comfortably beaten
another wrong 'un but this time Lyon's prepared. He plants his front leg across his stumps and lets it go outside off

traps him! It's a full toss. Lyon plays all around it. The sweep shot doesn't connect and Lyon knows he's plumb. This is the orthodox legbreak. It lands flush on the big toe. In such cases the umpires project a straight line from the point of impact to the stumps. Will this ball hit it? Yes, says Ian Gould.
floated around off, comes forward and blocks
back of length around off defended from the back foot
a touch fuller this time, around off and middle, flicked towards midwicket for a couple
short of length this time, just around off, defended towards the covers from the back foot
a slower yorker, just around the off stump, Starc is watchful and gets his bat down just in time, 113 kph this one
fuller around off, 142.7 kph this one, Starc stands tall and smashes it wide off mid-off for four
back of length around off, defended on the back foot
tossed up around off, comes forward and blocks
straighter one, around off and middle, defended back
short outside off, doesn't bounce much, goes back and cuts it hard, finds the cover fielder though
dropped! Tossed up and that's gone up, Hazlewood ends up top-edging the sweep, Vihari moves to his left from mid-on, he's never quite under it, goes reverse cups but fails to grab
fuller outside off, pushed towards covers
length around off, spinning away, left alone
fuller on the stumps, almost exposes his stumps but manages to defend it down the track, 147.9 kph
another yorker just outside off, at 147, Hazlewood just manages to get his bat down
148.8 kph this one, fuller on the stumps, Hazlewood us somehow surviving, puts his bat in front
a bouncer this time, aimed at the batsman, Hazlewood tumbles while ducking under, but manages to survive
fuller, angling on the stumps, flicked behind square for a couple
145.8 kph, length ball on middle, Hazlewood defends it on the leg side
floated around off, Starc takes it on the full and hits it to mid-off
length around off, pushes it back
length outside off, punched off the back foot towards covers
pitched up this time, comes forward and drives it back to Jadeja who makes a partial stop
length on middle and leg, flicked towards midwicket
back of length outside off, punched to the right of the bowler who fields himself
googly, dragging Hazlewood forward outside off. The batsman defends
full and outside off, Hazlewood defends
eases into a drive as the wristspinner keeps tossing the ball up. No runs on offer though at cover
full toss on leg stump, Hazlewood taps it down the ground, between the non-striker and stumps
outside edge as Hazlewood searches for this legbreak, hoping he makes some contact. Beautiful attacking bowling. Targeting the stumps. Getting turn either way
goes back to block a shorter delivery on off stump
good length and outside off, Hazlewood blocks
pushes it through on and around off stump. Hazlewood moves across his stumps and taps to short midwicket
good length, outside off, defends to point
beats the outside edge as Hazlewood comes forward to block, expecting more turn than there was on that occasion
full and outside off, blocks to point
ripper again as Jadeja draws Hazlewood forward, makes him play outside the off stump and beats the outside edge just like that
loops it up, gets it to drift in, then it pitches and turn. Starc deals with it all with a big stride, defending with the turn
lobs it up on off stump, Starc is right forward to smother it
skids through - that's the flipper looking for middle stump - and Starc only deals with it because of the slowness of the pitch.
too short, and just enough width for Starc to rock back and hammer the ball through cover point
nicely flighted, a shade outside off, Starc uses his reach to good effect to defend
pushes it through, but Starc is right behind it again, a firm push to cover
sweeps the length ball from outside off and it scurries away to the square leg boundary
full and outside off, he drives through cover
good length outside off, defends
full on off stump, Starc pushes it to cover
shortish and outside off, punches to cover point. That's drinks
length outside off, punched towards cover-point off the back foot
length, flatter on the stumps, pushed back
short of length outside off, cuts it towards sweeper cover
defended on the front foot
short of length, cuts it towards cover for one
fuller around off, pushed back
tossed up around off, comes forward and defends
fuller around off, lofted over the bowler's head, didn't time it well, Vihari from mid-on chases, puts in the slide and prevents the boundary
flighted outside off, looks to go big down the ground, ends up slicing it over cover
fuller around off, pushed towards the left of cover fielder for one
fuller on the pads, looks to flick it away but misses, rapped on the pads
drives this full ball on the front foot, Kuldeep moves across to his left to stop
length ball, around off, Hazlewood goes for the sweep but straight to square leg
length outside off, comes forward and defends
fuller on the stumps, clears his front leg and just clears the mid-on fielder
fuller again, driven along the ground this time, Pujara makes a tumbling stop at mid-on
length outside off, defended on the off side
length again, comes forward and blocks
flighted outside off, on a length and spinning away, left alone
flighted again, fuller outside off, driven hard, Kohli at extra cover intercepts and manages to deflect it towards mid-off
length outside off, lobbed in the air, over extra cover, lands safe
length outside off, pushed towards covers from the crease
goes aerial again, this time straight back over mid-on, the fielder puts in the chase and stops it just inside
flighted outside off and driven nicely but the cover fielder moves to his left and cuts it
starts with a length ball but way down the leg side, Pant makes a good diving stop
back of length outside off, punched towards mid-off
length ball, swatted through midwicket, Agarwal runs all the way and puts in the dive, not very elegant but effective
length, just around off and middle, Hazlewood was on the back foot but gets his bat in the line to keep it out
short one, angling in, Hazlewood tries to back away but the ball follows him, gets hit on the arm guard as he takes his eyes off
a fuller one, on the stumps, Hazlewood stands in his crease and blocks
short of length around off, slow turn, punched towards mid-off from the back foot
googly, length ball around off, defended back
tossed up around off, lobs it towards mid-off but the fielder is a bit deep, 300 comes up with that single
flighted outside off, length ball and spinning away, left alone

that's five-for for Kuldeep, done with the wrong'un. Length ball, pitching just outside off and spinning back to beat the forward defence, rapped on the pad and up goes the finger. Hazlewood decides to review it. Impact is in the line, no bat involved. And it's just clipping the top of leg stump, umpire's call there and that remains out
gets it to straighten after hitting back of a length. A squared-up Khawaja blocks towards point
lovely bowling. It's nice and full. It's searching for off stump. Or lbw. Khawaja just about reacts early enough, getting the bat to intervene
outside edge as Khawaja molds his body into the shape of an S as the ball nips away off the seam. No run to point
shortish on off stump, defends towards cover
lets go the back of a length delivery outside off

brilliantly done! That's what Test-quality batsmen should do. Read the bad ball early. Be ready to put it away. This is angled too steeply into Khawaja's pads and he whips it away to the long leg boundary quite imperiously
too good! Pitches it up. Gets just a hint of movement off the pitch. Harris doesn't feel like moving his feet just yet. No such qualms about going for the on-the-up drive though and ends up beaten
good length on middle stump, Harris is right behind this one
good length, outside off, no shot
lifter, going across the left-hander. Harris does well to read the line early and let it go
leans into the cover drive - although there is a bit of risk in here since he isn't to the pitch of the ball.
back of a length and outside off, allows it through to the keeper
blocks a shortish delivery on off stump. It appears almost as if he gets squared up every ball from Shami. This angle from round the wicket, and the ball straightening isn't really to his liking
works a full delivery on middle away to mid-on
moves across in front of off stump and then legs the back of a length ball go outside his eyeline
good length, outside off, good leave
lovely bowling. The line is perfect. Nagging away in that corridor outside off. Khawaja does well too, picking it up early and avoiding the danger altogether
spears it into middle, looking for lbw, especially with Khawaja stuck in the crease. He does well despite that, bringing down a straight bat
nudges it off his pads through midwicket. Good balance. Lovely wristwork
back of a length and outside off, lets it go
good length, outside off, shoulders arms
hangs on his back foot, and this ball is perfect for it, back of a length and offering him the room he needs to crunch it to point

ducks straight into the line of a short ball and it balloons of his glove over to gully. This one is really meant to sail over the batsman, but a fourth-day pitch throws its own challenges to the batsmen. Harris is lucky that it hasn't carried
shortish and outside off, defends
